GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1_0: evaṃ tāvat prathame vimarśe dhvanilakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitvā dhvaniśāstragataṃ granthāntaraṃ dūṣayituṃ sāmānyena tāvat kāvyagatam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1_1: anaucityollāsarūpaṃ dūṣaṇaprapañcam upapādayitum āha - iha khalv ityādinā / uktam iti sahṛdayaiḥ / antaraṅgam iti sākṣād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1_2: rasaviṣayatvāt / ādyair iti dhvanikāraprabhṛtibhiḥ / tad uktam -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:4_0: ityādinā / bahiraṅgam iti vācyamukhena rase paryavasānād vidheyaḥ prādhānyena pratipipādayiṣito yo 'rthas tasya avimarśo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:4_1: 'nanusaṃdhānam upasarjanīkaraṇāt / prakramaḥ kasya cid vastuno nirvāhāyārambhas tasya bhedo madhye 'nyathīkaraṇam anyathānirvāhaś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:4_2: ca / kramasya paripāṭyā bheda ullaṅghanaṃ vyutkrama iti yāvat / paunaruktyaṃ punaḥpratipādanam / vācyasya vaktavyasya avacanam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_0: yad etad ihagranthakṛtā vicārasaraṇim āśritya vidheyāvimarśādidoṣapañcakam udbhāvitaṃ, na tatrādyatanapuruṣamātrabuddhipraṇayanāsūyayānādaraḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_1: karaṇīyaḥ / pūrvair evaṃvidhadoṣodbhāvanarūpasya vicārasya praṇītatvāt / tathā hi / dāsyāḥ putra ityādāv ākrośe ṣaṣṭhyā alukaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_2: pratipādayatā sūtrakṛtā vidheyāvimarśaḥ sūcita eva / tathā svāmīśvarādhipatidāyādety atra sūtre na hi bhavati gavāṃ svāmī
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_3: aśveṣu ca iti vadatā bhāṣyakṛtā spaṣṭam eva prakramabhedaḥ pratipāditaḥ / tathā kṛñcānuprayujyate liṭi iy atrānuprayogasyānuśabdaparyālocanayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_4: vyavahitapūrvaprayogaṃ taṃ pātayāṃ prathamam āsa ityādau niṣedhatā cādīnāṃ ca na hi bhavati ca vṛkṣaḥ ityādinā prayoganiyamakhyāpanena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_5: dyotakatvaṃ kathayatā asthānaprayogalakṣaṇaḥ kramabhedaḥ kaṭākṣita eva / tathā karmadhārayamatvarthīyābhyāṃ bahuvrīhir laghutvāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_6: syād iti vṛttilāghavaṃ cintayatā kātyāyanena paunaruktyam api prakāśitam eva / tathā īṣad asamāptau ity atra pratijñānasamadhigamyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_7: sūtrakāroktaṃ rūpakalakṣaṇam arthaṃ dūṣayatā prakṛtyarthasadṛśe kalpavādividhānam iti pratijñānasamadhigamyārthabhūtām upamāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_8: vyavasthāpayatopamāśrayeṇa vācyāvacanam api dyotitam eva / etena rūpakāśrayeṇāvācyavacanam api dyotitam eva / tad evaṃ mahāviduṣāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_9: mārgam anusṛtya sahṛdayaśikṣādarāya vicārayandaraṃto 'sya mahāmater na kaś cit paryanuyogaleśasyāpy avasara ity alam atiprasaṅgena /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:6_0: etasya ceti sāmānyenānaucityasya / doṣā iti kāvyasya vikṛtatvāpādanād dūṣaṇād doṣā iti / mugdha iti pṛṣṭasyāprativikṛtatve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:6_1: trīṇi kāraṇāni / prativacanāpratibhānalakṣaṇaṃ maugdhyaṃ pratibhāne 'py aprauḍharūpatvam asahyatvam / prauḍhatve 'pi guṇāsahiṣṇutvalakṣaṇaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:6_2: mātsaryam / tāny atra saṃdihyamānatayā krameṇoktāni / yaḥ kilety atraiva cchedaḥ / chātrābhyarthanayeti praṣṭṛtvasyāṅgīkṛtam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:6_3: iti prativaktṛtvasya ca nirdeśaḥ / paurobhāgyaṃ doṣaikagrāhitvam / nanu yadi parakīye kāvye parihārāya doṣāṇāṃ vicāraḥ kriyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:6_4: tat kiṃ nijakāvye na teṣāṃ parihāraḥ / tathā ca bhajate mātsaryamaunaṃ nu kim ity ato 'nantaram iti pṛṣṭa ity evaṃ krameṇetiśabdo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:6_5: nirdeśyaḥ kramāntareṇa nirdeśāt kramabhedo na yujyate / evam anyat śokāpadānādau jñeyam / tadartham āha - svakṛtiṣv iti kṛtiḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_0: saṃrambha iti kutsitāḥ kariṇaḥ karikīṭāḥ kutsitāni kutsanaiḥ iti samāsaḥ / karikīṭānām āśādviradaiḥ pratinirdeśaḥ / meghaśakalānāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_1: tu kalpāntatoyadaiḥ ya ity atraiva cchedaḥ / ayaṃ śloko vakroktijīvite vitatya vyākhyāta iti tata evāvadhāryaḥ / tāvacchabdo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_2: vidheyāvimarśatrayasyaitacchlokagatasyopakramadyotakaḥ / saṃbandhopapatter iti / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - samarthaḥ padavidhiḥ iti vacanāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_3: samāsaḥ sāmarthyanimittakaḥ / sāmarthyaṃ ca saṅgatārthatvaṃ, saṅgatatvaṃ ca saṃbandhaḥ / sa cātra viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_4: paryudāsasyaiva viśeṣaṇaṃ nañā abrāhmaṇa iti yathā / na cātra vakṣyamāṇanyāyena paryudāso ghaṭata iti / nanv abrāhmaṇa ityādau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_5: nañ kathaṃ viśeṣaṇam / viśeṣaṇaṃ hi viśeṣyasyoparañjakaṃ bhavati / na ca nañśabdo viruddhatvād vidhim uparañjayati / tat
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_6: katham asya viśeṣaṇatvam / naitat / abrāhmaṇa ityādau brāhmaṇaśabdo brāhmaṇasadṛśe kṣatriyādau vartate / sā cākṣatriyādau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_7: brāhmaṇaśabdasya vṛttir nañā dyotyate / tad uktam - nañ ivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe tatha hy artha iti / tatra ca śabdaśaktisvābhāvyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_8: kāraṇam / yathā caitat tathā nañsūtrabhāṣyād avaseyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_0: pradhānatvam iti / yatra vidheḥ prādhānyaṃ pratiṣedhasyāprādhānyaṃ naña uttarapadena saṃbandhaḥ samarthasamāsa ekavākyatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_1: ca tatra paryudāsaḥ kiṃ cid varjayitvā kasya cid upadeśo nirāsa iti nigamanāt / tatra kārikāyāṃ trayaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ dvayaṃ cākṣipyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_2: jugopeti / atra nañarthaviśiṣṭasyottarapadārthasya vidhir na trastatvādiniṣedhaḥ / tatrāpy atrastatvādeḥ siddhatvāt tadanuvādena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_3: gopanādi vidhīyata iti paryudāsatvam / aprādhānyam iti / yatra pratiṣedhasya prādhānyaṃ vidher aprādhānyyaṃ nañaḥ kriyāpadena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_4: saṃbandho 'samarthasamāsaḥ vākyabhedaś ca, tatra prasajya prāpayya pratiṣedha iti prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ / atra kārikāyāṃ traye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_5: nirdiṣṭe 'nyad dvayam ākṣiptam / na veti / atra dṛptaniśācaraṃ prati niṣedhaḥ pratīyate, na tv adṛptaniśācaravidhir iti prasajyapratiṣedhatā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_6: saṃrambhavatpratiṣedho hy atreti / saṃrabdhavān yaḥ puruṣas tadgatā yeyaṃ saṃrabdhatā saṃrambhaṇakriyā tasyā vakṣyamāṇanyāyena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_7: pratiṣedha ity arthaḥ / asaṃradhavadvidhir iti saṃrabdhavatsadṛśasya saṃrambhasadṛśakriyākarttur udāsīnaprāyasya vidhir ity
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_8: arthaḥ / yad uktaṃ nañ iva yuktam ityādi / tatreti saṃrabdahavatpratiṣedhe / na cāsāv iti pratiṣedhati / tatsiddhipakṣa iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_9: vivakṣito yaḥ pradhānabhūtaniṣedhalakṣaṇo 'rthasya siddhipakṣa ity arthaḥ / asya vidhyanuvādabhāvasyeti / nañarthasya vidhir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_10: uttarapadārthasyānuvāda ity asya / samāse hi nañarthopasarjana uttarapadārthaḥ prādhānyena pratīyate / kāvyārtheti / atra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_11: vyavacchedyaṃ prasajyapratiṣedhaṃ pradarśya paricchedyaṃ paryudāsam udāharati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_0: nanu prasajyapratiṣedhe nañaḥ kriyānvaye 'saṃrabdahavān ity atra saṃrambhakriyāniṣedho bhaviṣyati / tat ko 'tra doṣa ity
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_1: āha: kriyākartraṃśabhāg iti / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ: asaṃrabdhavān ity atra dvāv aṃśau kriyāṃśaḥ kārakāṃśaś ca / tatrobhayāṃśabhāgarthaniṣedhe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_2: śabdaśaktisvābhāvyād vākye kriyāṃśaniṣedhas tasya prādhānyena vivakṣitasyāparāmarśam anuktād vidheyāvimarśaḥ / yathā ca prasajyapratiṣedhe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_3: samāso neṣṭas tathoktanayena paryudāse 'py asamāso neṣyata ity āha - nanu sādhv iti atra na kurvateti karaṇakriyākartṛsadṛśena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_4: kriyāṃ praty udāsīnaprāyeṇety arthaḥ / akurvateti vācye na kurvateti kriyāṃśaniṣedhaḥ pratīter vaiparītyakārī / evaṃ nocitam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_5: apīty ucitatvamātraniṣedhaḥ pratīter vaiparītyakṛd eva / tacchravaṇaṃ kriyāśravaṇam / tayor iti siddhārthā vṛttiḥ / sādhyārthaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_6: vākyam / asūryaṃpaśyādiṣv iti / atrāpi nañaḥ sūryeṇottarpadārthena nābhisaṃbandhaḥ, api tu taddraṣṭrarthenaiva / tatrāpi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_7: kartraṃśaḥ pradhānaṃ na kriyāṃśaḥ karttari khaśo vidhānād iti pūrvavad avaseyam / bhuṅkta iti atra hi vākyasya kriyāprādhānyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_8: pratīyamānabhavatyādikriyāpekṣe nañaḥ samanvaye śrāddhabhojī na bhavatīti vākyārthaḥ / aśrāddhabhojīty atra tu nañā bhoktus
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_9: samanvaye śrāddhabhoktṛvyatirikto 'pi vighasāśyā+i++ pratīyate / yataś cātrāśrāddhabhojītyādau samāse pratiṣedho neṣṭaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_10: tata eva samarthasamāsas tadviparyayeṇāsamarthasamāsaś ca kārikādvayenoktaḥ / vākyabhedābhedayos tu sāmarthyāt pratītir ity
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_0: evakemaṃ vidheyāvimarśaṃ vicārya dvitīyam udāharati - yo 'sāv ity atreti tacchabdaṃ praty ākāṅkṣāyāḥ kenāpy anivarttanāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_1: ekatareti kvacid yacchabdenopakrame tacchabdenopasaṃhāraḥ / kva cit tacchabdenopakrame yacchabdenopasaṃhāraḥ prasajyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_2: etac ca dvayaṃ śābdopakramopasaṃhārakrameṇodāhariṣyati / tayor apīti / apiśabdo nañarthaṃ samuccinoti / prasajyapratiṣedhe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_3: hi nañartho vidheyo niṣedhyo 'rtho 'nuvādyaḥ / paryudāse tu viparyaya ity uktaṃ prāg / anuvādyavidheyeti / yattador nityābhisaṃbandhe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_4: 'pi śabdaśaktisvābhāvyād yado 'nuvādyaviṣayatvaṃ tado vidheyaviṣayatvam / nityatvād iti / apekṣāprāṇatayāvasthānāt / śābda
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_5: iti śabdenobhayoḥ saṃsparśād / ubhayoḥ saṃsparśābhāva ārthatvam / tatra dvayī gatiḥ - anyatarānupādānaṃ dvayor anupādānaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_6: vā / anyatarānupādanam api yattadāśrayabhāvena dvidhā / krameṇa caitad udāhariṣyati / upakalpito nityasāpekṣatvād upasthāpitaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_7: atra ca prasiddhādiviṣayatvaṃ yadā nirdiṣṭam / sā kalā yā prasiddheti sphuṭatvena pratīteḥ / kva cit tado 'pi vyapadiśyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_8: tasya yacchabdenaikaviṣayatvāt / te iti ye mayaivānubhūte ity arthaḥ / anviyeṣa sa iti / atra sa iti yaḥ prakrānta ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_9: upāttavastv iti vakṣyamāṇaśloke ko 'pīti yad upāttaṃ vastu tadviṣayatvenety arthaḥ / asya upakramopasaṃhārasya prakrāntavastuviṣayasya /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_0: tacchabdāt prayogātiprasaṅganiyamaṃ prakāśayan parihāryaṃ viṣayaṃ pradarśayati / - yas tv ekavākya iti / ekavākyagrahaṇena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_1: parāmamṛśyasya pratyakṣāyamāṇatoktā / tataś ca vākyabhede na doṣaḥ / kartṛtveneti prādhānyaṃ sūcayati aprādhānyasya parāmarśo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_2: na duṣyatīti khyāpanārtham / sa ity arthaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ / tebhya iti kartṛtvavācakād idamādibhyaś ca / asau tacchabdaḥ / asamanvayād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_3: iti tacchabdasya parokṣārthapratipādakatve saṃbandhavirodhād ity arthaḥ / tādātmyāyeti / śaśikalāmaulisvarūpatvāyety arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_4: ārtha iti upakramopasaṃhārakramā nirdiṣṭaḥ / kalpitatatkramādīti / kalpitaṃ tad yac chabdanirdiṣṭaṃ karmādi viṣayo 'syeti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_5: yacchabdārthaḥ karmakaraṇāditayā viṣayatvenāsya kalpita ity arthaḥ / saṃbandhadvaividhyeti śābdārthabhedena dvaividhyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_6: yattad iti / yacchabdasamīpe samānādhikaraṇas tacchabda upādīyamānaḥ śabdaśaktisvābhāvyāt prasiddhavastuviṣayaṃ yacchabam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_7: ākāṅkṣati / vaiyadhikaraṇyena vyavadhānena ca nirdeśe tu nirdiṣṭenaiva yadā samanvayaṃ bhajate / na kevalaṃ yo mahato 'pabhāṣate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_8: śṛṇoti tasmād api yaḥ sa pāpabhāg ity atra yady api yaḥ sa iti yattador nairantaryeṇa sāmānādhikaraṇyena ca nirdeśaḥ, tathāpi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_9: na yat tad ūrjitam iti nyāyena tacchabdo yacchabdāntaraṃ praty apekṣāyām iha yadi tacchabdo nirantaropāttayacchabdāpekṣayaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_10: prayujyate, tadā syād eṣa doṣaḥ, yāvatā na kevalaṃ ya ity atra yacchabdāpekṣayā vyavadhānena prādhānyāt prayuktas tacchabdāntarānākāṅkṣaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_11: prasaṅgena nirantaranirdiṣṭayacchabdānvayaṃ bhajamānaḥ pūrvasaṃskāreṇa na tacchabdāntaram ākāṅkṣatīty anavadyam etat / tad
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_12: itthaṃ yattador upakramopasaṃhārakramo dvividhaḥ parighaṭitaḥ / sa cātra śloke na yujyata ity āha - evaṃ ceti / tadupādāna
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_13: iti / yacchabdo nātra tad eti prakrāntas tacchabdaḥ parāmṛśyate tatsaṃbandhapratītāv ity arthaḥ.
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_0: nanu prayogadarśanam evātra samarthakaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āśaṅkya prayogasya prāmādikapāṭhaviparyāsahetukatvam āha - mīlitam iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_1: tadabhinnārthaḥ tacchabdābhinnārthaḥ / tasya adaśśabdasya / tacchabdābhinnārthatve 'daśśabdasya dūṣaṇadvayam uktam / kevalādaśśabdapryoge
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_2: asau marud ityādau yacchabdākāṅkṣā syād ity ekaṃ yacchabdasahāyasyādaśśabdasya prayoge yo 'sau jagattrayetyādau prayuktatacchabdākāṅkṣā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_3: na syād iti dvitīyam / atra yasya prakopetyadaśśabdarahitayacchabdaprayogo dṛṣṭāntatvenokto yathāsya kevalasya tacchabdākāṅkṣā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_4: tathādaśśabdayuktasyāpīty arthaḥ / parikalpyata iti tasya yathoktavastv iti yathā avigānena śiṣṭaprasiddhipāraṃparyeṇoktaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_5: vastu tacchabdārthavivikto viṣayas tasya tanmate asaṃbhavaḥ / tvayā hy adaśśabdasya tacchabdārthatvam ucyate tatra yacchabdaparāmarśāpekṣāprasaṅgaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_6: ity arthaḥ / parikalpyata iti prayogapravāhaprāmāṇyānyathānupapattyāvāyātayārthāpattyety arthaḥ / tam antareṇeti / tacchabdena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_7: prayogapravāhaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ / tadatadarthatvaniścayo vivakṣitāvivakṣitārthatvaniścayaḥ / yadi tu tām iti tadabhinnārthatānupapattiḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_8: parāmṛṣṭā / gate 'nugataṃ yasya sa gatānugatikaḥ / matvarthīyo 'tra ṭhanpratyayaḥ / yenaiva pathā eko gacchati tenaivāvicāritenaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_9: yo gacchati sa ity arthaḥ / tato bhāvapratyayaḥ / avikalpam ity akārapraśleṣaḥ / niśśaṅkam ity arthaḥ / yad vā na vikalpamātreṇa,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_10: api tu sākṣād ity arthaḥ / smṛtibhūḥ kāmaḥ / dvitīyaḥ smṛtibhūśabdaḥ smaraṇaviṣaye prayuktaḥ / dagdhatvāt smṛtimātraśeṣa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_11: ity arthaḥ / kṣatāt vadhāt / vyavahitānām eveti yathā yo 'vikalpam ityādau / avyavahitatve veti / yathā smṛtibhūr ityādau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13_0: tatra hīti idamādisahitaprayoge / tayor iti yattadoḥ / taditareti yadṛcchayaikataraprayoge anyatarāpekṣety arthaḥ / sutarām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13_1: iti idamādisāhityena prayukto yacchabdaḥ svabhāvato vikāsitāsya eva tacchabdaṃ pratīkṣate, evaṃ tacchabdo 'pi yacchabdam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13_2: iti jñeyam / etac ca krameṇodāhṛtaṃ yad etad iti, so 'yam iti ca / tad anyena granthena pradarśaka upayujyate tadvad asya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13_3: yacchabdasya na prakrāntaparāmarśe saṃbandho, nāpi prakraṃsyamānavastusamanvayamārgopadeśe tacchabdādhyāhāraḥ śaraṇam / sa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13_4: ca satkāvyakalaṅkāyamāno heya eva anuktvaiveti yattador madhye parāmṛśyam anuktvā yatra nirantaraḥ prayogaḥ yathā yat tad
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13_5: ūrjitam ityādau tatra tayor yattador yathāyogaṃ punaḥ prayogo na duṣyati yatha nūnaṃ tad api hāritam ityādau / tathā tayor
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13_6: yattadoḥ / nirantaranirdiṣṭeṣv idamādiṣu satsu tayor yattadoḥ teṣām idamādīnāṃ ca saṅghaṭitatvena sthitānāṃ yathāyogaṃ yattadoḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13_7: pratyavekṣā na nivarttate yathā aprayukteṣv idamādiṣu kevalayoḥ pṛthagavasthitayor apekṣā na nivarttate tadvat prayukteṣv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13_8: apīty arthaḥ yathā yad etac candrāntar iti, so 'yaṃ paṭa iti ca / evaṃ prakṛte 'pi yo 'sāv iti / tatsāṅkaryeti / yacchabdasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13_9: pṛthag idamādisāhitye tacchabdasya ca pṛthag idamādisāhitye yattadoḥ parasparasāhitye ca bahavo bhedāḥ, teṣām udāharaṇeṣu
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_0: saṃprati prāyeṇa vākyārthasamanvayavyāpinor yattador yo 'yaṃ nityābhisaṃbandhatvenopakramopasaṃhārakramaḥ, sa prasaṅgād vicāryate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_1: sa ca puṣṭāpuṣṭaduṣṭabhedena trividhaḥ / puṣṭo 'pi prathamaṃ śābdatvārthatvabhedena dvividhaḥ / śābdo 'pi yacchabdopakramas
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_2: tacchabdopakramaś ceti dvividhaḥ / ārtho 'pi yacchabdamātrānupādāne tacchabdasyopāttasya prasiddhānubhūtaprakrāntaviṣayeṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_3: yadābhisaṃbandhāt trividhaḥ / yacchabdasya ca tacchabdānupādāne kevalam upāttasya prakrāntaviṣayeṇa kalpitatatkarmādiviṣayeṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_4: ca tadābhisaṃbandhād dvividhaḥ / ubhayānupādāne tu dvayor upāttavastuviṣayatākalpana eka eva bhedaḥ / evaṃ śābdo dvividha
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_5: ārthaḥ ṣaḍbheda ity aṣṭavidho yattador upakramopasaṃhārakramaḥ puṣṭaḥ / tac caitac ceha granthakṛtodāhṛtam / yat tadūrjitam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_6: ityādau tu śābdasyārthasya copasaṃhārakramasya saṅkīrṇatvam iti nāsya pṛthagbhāvaḥ / apuṣṭasya duṣṭamadhye prasaṅgena varṇayiṣyamāṇatvād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_7: idānīṃ duṣṭo vyākriyate / tatra yattadoḥ sthāne tacchabdayacchabdanairantaryeṇa sāmānādhikaraṇyena cedamādīnaṃ duṣṭataiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_8: teṣām atadarthatvāt tannikaṭe ca prayujyamānānāṃ prasiddhimātraparāmarśakatvād, yathā yo 'sau kutra camatkṛter iti / evaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_9: tacchabdasācivyenedamādīnām udāharaṇam ūhyam / viprakṛṣṭatvena sannikṛṣṭatve 'pi vaiyadhikaraṇyena vā teṣām prayoge na duṣṭaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_10: nāduṣṭam ity apuṣṭatvam eva yathā yo 'vikalpam iti smṛtibhūḥ smṛtibhūr iti ca / evaṃ tacchabdopakrama udāharttvayam / tathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_12: sa vaḥ śaśikalāmaulir ityādau / pradhānagrahaṇena na kartṛmātraṃ nirdiṣṭam, api tu kārakāntaram api prādhānyena vivakṣitatvāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:17_0: iti medinyās tacchabdaparāmarśo na sundara ity āhuḥ / yathā yattadoḥ padārthavākyārthagatatvena dvividhāvasthāne yad ekasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:17_1: padārthaniṣṭhatvād anyasya vākyārthaviṣayatvaṃ tad bhinnaviṣayatvena nityābhisaṃbandhaparipanthi duṣṭam eva / yathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:18: hemrāṃ bhāraśatāni vā madamucāṃ bṛndāni vā dantināṃ śrīharṣeṇa yad arpitāni guṇine bāṇāya kutrādya tat /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:19: yā bāṇena tu tasya sūktivisarair uṭṭaṅkitāḥ kīrttayas tat kalpapralaye 'pi yānti na manāṅ manye parimlānatām //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:20_0: iti / yā iti padārthaviṣayatvam anipātasya tacchabdasya / tad iti tu vākyārthaviṣayas tacchabdaḥ / padārthaviṣaye tā iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:20_1: syāt / atraiva yad bāṇena tu tasyeti tāḥ kalpapralaye 'pi iti ca pāṭhe yado vākyārthaviṣayatve tadaḥ padārthaniṣṭhatva udāharaṇaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:20_2: deyam / tasmād yā bāṇena tv iti tāḥ kalpapralaye 'pīti ca paṭhanīyam / iha tu
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:21: indīvaraṃ yadatasīkusumasya vṛttyā yat ketakaṃ jaraḍhabhūrjadalānuvṛttyā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:22: yan manyase ca vakulaṃ karavīravṛttyā sā sāmprataṃ madhupa hanta tavaiva hāniḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:23_0: iti na kevalaṃ yacchabdo vākyārthaviṣaye, yāvat tacchabdo 'pi / yadi paraṃ sa vākyārtho hānipadena piṇḍīkṛtya prakāśitas
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:23_1: tacchabdena parāmṛṣṭaḥ / ata evātra tacchabdasya vidheyapadārthābhiprāyeṇa strīliṅgatvam / anuvādyābhiprāyeṇa tu tat sāmpratam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:24_0: kiṃ ca yattador nityābhisaṃbandhād guṇapradhānayoś ca saṃbandhārhatvāt parāmṛśya ekatra yacchabdavākye tacchabdavākye vā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:24_1: nirdiṣṭa itaravākye tadā yadā vā pratyavamṛśyate / yacchabdavākye tu nirdiṣṭena yacchabdāntareṇa guṇānāṃ pradhānānāṃ ca parasparam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:24_2: abhisaṃbandhāt / evaṃ ca tathā parāmarśe dvau duṣṭābhedau / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:25: yeṣāṃ tās tridaśebhadānasaritaḥ pītāḥ pratāpoṣmabhir līlāpānabhuvaś ca nandanatarucchāyāsu yaiḥ kalpitāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:26: yeṣāṃ huṅkṛtayaḥ kṛtāmarapurakṣobhāḥ kṣapācāriṇāṃ kiṃ tais tvatparitoṣakāri vihitaṃ kiṃ cit pravādocitam //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:27_0: iti / kṣapācāriṇām iti ṣaṣṭhyantaṃ yacchabdena saṃbaddhaṃ yacchadbāntareṇa partyavamṛṣṭam / kṣapācāribhir iti pāṭho nyāyyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:27_1: evaṃ tacchabdavākye nirdiṣṭaṃ yacchabdaiḥ parāmṛśyamānaṃ na duṣyati, yathā ca:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:28: puṇḍrekṣoḥ paripākapāṇḍunibiḍe yo madhyame parvaṇi khyātaḥ kiṃ ca rasaḥ kaṣāyamadhuro yo rājajambūphale /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:29: tasyāsvādadaśāviluṇṭanapaṭur yeṣāṃ vacovibhramaḥ sarvatraiva jayanti citramatayas te bharttṛmeṇḍādayaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:30: iti / atra dvitīye yacchabdavākye rasaḥ parāmṛśyo nirdiṣṭas tacchabdena parāmṛśyate / prathame yacchabdavākye tu yacchadaparāmarśo na yujyate dvayor asaṃbandhād, yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:31: namo 'stu tābhyo bhuvane jayanti tāḥ sudhāmucas tāś ca kavīndrasūktayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:32: bhavaikavicchedi kathāśarīratām upaiti yāsāṃ caritaṃ pinākinaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:33_0: iti kavīndrasūktīnāṃ tacchabdavati vākyena nirdiṣṭānāṃ tacchabdāntareṇa parāmarśo na yuktaḥ / kiṃ ca yattacchabdayoḥ svabhāvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:33_1: vākyabhedotthāpakatve yad ekataravākye 'nyatarat padaṃ prayujyānyatarat prayujyate tad api duṣṭam eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:34: aprākṛtasya caritātiśayaiś ca dṛṣṭair atyadbhutair apahṛtasya tathāpi nāsthā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:35: ko 'py eṣa vīraśiśukākṛtir aprameyamāhātmyasārasam udāyamayaḥ padārthaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:36: ity atra yady apīty apekṣitam / na ca tadekavākyatāyāṃ saṃbandhuṃ yogyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:37_0: ekatrāpi vākye guṇakriyādigataṃ kalpitaṃ bhedam āśritya prakrāntavastuviṣayatacchabdaprayoge pradhānakriyāyāṃ parāmṛśyasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:37_1: pradhānatvād eva svarūpeṇa nirdeśe guṇakriyādiviṣaye tu tacchabdena parāmarśe nyāyye yadviparyayakaraṇaṃ tad duṣṭam eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:38: prajānām eva bhūtyarthaṃ sa tābhyo balim agrahīt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:39: sahasraguṇam utsraṣṭum ādatte hi rasaṃ raviḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:40: iti / baliṃ prajābhyo jagrāha sa tāsām eva bhūtaye iti yuktaḥ pāṭhaḥ / tathaikaviṣayatve yattador ekasya dravyādiviṣayatve 'nyasya kālādigocaratve duṣṭam eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:41: tvam evaṃ saundaryā sa ca ruciratāyāḥ paricitaḥ kalānāṃ sīmānaṃ param iha yuvām eva bhajathaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:42: ayi! dvandvaṃ diṣṭyā tad iti subhage! saṃvadati vāmataḥ śeṣaṃ yat syāj jitam iha tadānīṃ guṇitayā //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:43: atra ataḥ śeṣaṃ cet syād iti paṭhanīyaṃ cec chabdasya yadiśabdārthatvāt / tathā prakrāntaviṣayatve tacchabdasya vyavasthite tadviṣaye prakramyamāṇavastugocaratvaṃ doṣa eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:44: ye saṃtoṣasukhaprabuddhamanasas teṣāṃ na bhinno mado ye 'py ete dhanalobhasaṃkuladhiyas teṣāṃ tu dūre nṛṇām /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:45: itthaṃ kasya kṛte kṛtaḥ sa vidhinā tādṛk padaṃ saṃpadāṃ svātmany eva samāptahemamahimā merur na me rocate //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:46: atra meruḥ prakramyamāṇaḥ sa ity anena parāmṛṣṭaḥ / etad vākyabheda udāharaṇam / ekavākye tu:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:47: tīrthe tadīye gajasetubandhāt pratīpagām uttarato 'sya gaṅgām /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:48: iti deyam / tathā nirvīpsenaikenopakrame savīpsenānyena parāmarśo duṣṭa eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:49: yaḥ kalyāṇabahirbhūtaḥ sa sa durgatim aśnute /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:50: savīpsena tv ekena prakrame nirvīpsenānyenopasaṃhāraḥ savīpsasya pratyavamṛṣṭatvād na duṣṭānvayaḥ kin tv apuṣṭa eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:51: kalyāṇānāṃ tvam asi mahasāmīśiṣe tvaṃ vidhatse puṇyāṃ lakṣmīm iha mayi ciraṃ dhehi deva! prasīda /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:52: yad yat pratijahi jagannātha! namrasya tan me bhadraṃ bhadraṃ vitara bhagavan! bhūyase maṅgalāya //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:53: iti / atra yad yad iti nirdiṣṭaṃ kevalena tacchabdena parāmṛṣṭam / etad yacchabdasya savīpsasyodāharaṇam / tacchabdasya tu savīpsasya nirvīpsena parāmarśa udāharaṇaṃ yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:54: kṣāntaṃ na kṣamayā gṛhocitasukhaṃ tyaktaṃ na santoṣataḥ soḍho dussahaśītavātatapanakleśo na taptaṃ tapaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:55: dhyātaṃ nityam ahar niśaṃ niyamitaprāṇair na śambhoḥ padaṃ tat tat karma kṛtaṃ yad eva munibhis tais taiḥ phalair vañcitāḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:56: iti / yatra tu savīpsasya prakrame savīpsena pratyavamarśas tatra puṣṭatvam eva yathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:57: yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibhartti svabhujagurum adaḥ pāṇḍavīnāṃ camūnāṃ yo yaḥ pāñcālagotre śiśur adhikavayā garbhaśayyāṃ gato vā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:58: yo yas tatkarmasākṣī carati mayi raṇe yaś ca yaś ca pradīptaḥ krodhāndhas tasya tasya svayam api jagatām antakasyāntako 'ham //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:59: iti / yatra cānekasya savīpsasya cānekena pratyavamarśas, tatrāpi puṣṭatvam eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:60: yo yo yaṃ yam avāpnuyād avayavoddeśaṃ spṛśan pāṇinā tat tanmātrakam eva yatra sa sa te rūpaṃ paraṃ manyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:61: tajjātyandhapuraṃ ha hā karipate! nīto 'si durvedhasā ko nāmātra bhaved batākhilabhavan māhātmyavedī janaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:62_0: iti / yadi paraṃ yaṃ yam iti prakrame tat tanmātrakam eveti pratyavamarśe vidheyāvimarśaḥ savīpsasya tadarthasya samāse guṇībhāvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:62_1: naitat / mātragrahaṇenāvadhāraṇam ucyate yathā - prātipadikārthaliṅgaparimāṇavacanamātre iti / taccāvadhāryamāṇaparatantram
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:62_2: ity avadhāryamāṇasyaiva savīpsasya tadarthasyodrekāt prādhānyam akhaṇḍitam eva / pūrvapadārthaprādhānyena kva cit supsupeti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:63: nirvāṇabhūyiṣṭham athāsya vīryaṃ sandhukṣayantīva vapur guṇena /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:65_0: iti / atra hi bhūyiṣṭhaṃ nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇabhūyiṣṭham iti samāse nirvāṇārthasyaiva prādhānyaṃ tasya vīryaviśeṣaṇatvenāvasthitatvād /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:65_1: na tadvad iha tattanmātrakam iti tadarthasya prādhānyaṃ bhaviṣyati / kevalaṃ kṛte 'vadhāraṇārthe mātraśabde kimarthaḥ kapratyayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:65_2: tasminn api vā kṛte evaśabdaḥ kimarthaḥ / evaśabda eva vā kiṃ na kriyate / naitat / kapratyayasya tāvad atra kutsāpratipādakatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:65_3: na paunaruktyaṃ tan tameveti kevalaivaśabdaprayoge vikṣipta iva tadarthaḥ pratīyate / mātragrahaṇe tu piṇḍitasyaiva tadarthasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:65_4: pratītir ity asti viśeṣaḥ / yadi paraṃ dvayor upādānaṃ lokapratītyanusaraṇena dṛḍhīkṛtāvadhāraṇapratītyartham / dṛśyate hīdṛśeṣu
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:65_5: dvayor avadhāraṇapratipādakayoḥ prayogaḥ / yathā - bālā kevalam eva roditi galallolodakair aśrubhiḥ / atraiva tad iti nirvīpsena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:65_6: tadā nirdiṣṭaṃ jātyandhapuraṃ nirvīpsenaiva yadā pratyavamṛśyate / tataś cātrānuguṇaparāmarśān na doṣaḥ kaś cit /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:66: tathā yatra pūrvavākye yacchabdo nirdiṣṭa uttaravākye tu na tacchabdo nirdiṣṭaḥ, tatra sākāṅkṣatvād duṣṭaiva yathā -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:67: mīlitaṃ yad abhirāmatādhike sādhu candramasi puṣkaraiḥ kṛtam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:68_0: iti / uttaravākyagatatvena tu yacchabdaprayoge pūrvavākye tacchabdaprayoge na duṣṭatvam, api tu prākpratipāditaṃ puṣṭatvam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:68_1: eva sāmānyenopakramāt paścād viśeṣasyotthāpanāt / etadabhiprāyeṇa kalpitatatkarmādiviṣayatvam uktam / udāharaṇaṃ tu sādhu
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:68_2: candramasi puṣkaraiḥ kṛtaṃ mīlitaṃ yadabhirāmatādhike iti pūrvaślokārdhapāṭhaviparyaye yathā / yattacchabdayor aviśiṣṭe 'pi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:68_3: parāmarśakatve uttaravākye nirdiṣṭo yacchabdaḥ svabhāvata āvidūryeṇa pūrvavākyārthāśliṣṭatayā vastu parāmṛśati, tacchabdas
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:68_4: tu parokṣāyamāṇārthaniṣṭhatvāt vaidūryeṇa / āvidūryaṃ ca prakṛtārthaṃ prakṛṣṭatāṃ nayad vākyārthaṃ śleṣayati / tataś ca tathābhūte
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:68_5: viṣaye yacchabdasya prayogārhatve tacchabdasya prayogo 'puṣṭa eva.
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:69: tasyāḥ śalākāñjananirmiteva kāntir bhruvor ānatarekhayor yā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:70: tāṃ vīkṣya līlācaturām anaṅgaḥ svacāpasaundaryam adaṃ mumoca //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:71: atra sā yāṃ vīkṣyeti yattadau viparyayeṇa paṭhanīyau / yathā ca:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:72: dṛṣṭir nāmṛtavarṣiṇī smitamadhuprasyandi vaktraṃ na kiṃ nārdrārdraṃ hṛdayaṃ na candanarasasparśāni vāṅgāni ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:73: kasmin labdhapadena te kṛtam idaṃ krūreṇa dagdhāgninā nūnaṃ vajramayo 'nya eva dahanas tasyedam āceṣṭitam //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:75: ācāryo me sa khalu bhagavān asmadgrāhyanāmā tasmād eṣā dhanur upaniṣat tatprasādāt kṣamo 'pi /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:76: adhyāsīnaḥ katham aham aho vartma vaikhānasānāṃ sītāpāṇigrahaṇapaṇitaṃ cāpam āropayāmi //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:77_0: atra ca yasmād eṣā dhanur upaniṣad iti paṭhanīyam / evaṃ ca prāg ukte hemno bhārataśatānītyādau tā bāṇena tu tasya sūktivisarair
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:77_1: uṭṭaṅkitāḥ kīrtayo yāḥ kalpapralaye 'pi yānti na manāṅ manye parimlānatām iti paṭhanīyam / api ca parāmṛśyam anuktvā yacchabdena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:77_2: ca vākyārthopakrame tacchabdavati parāmṛśyanirdeśe pūrvavākyārthe parāmṛśyam aspṛśantī upaplavamānā pratītir iti vākyārthapratipattiviprakarṣād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:79: svasthād evāvamānena dehinas tad varaṃ rajaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:80_0: ata evātra ślokārdhayor viparyayapāṭhe puṣṭatvam eva / tathā pūrvavākyārthe nirdiṣṭasyārthasyottaravākyārthe sarvanāmamātreṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:80_1: parāmarśe nyāyye yaḥ svaśabdasahitasya sarvanāmno nirdeśaḥ sa duṣṭa eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:81: udanvacchinnā bhūḥ sa ca nidhir apāṃ yojanaśataṃ sadā pānthaḥ pūṣā gaganaparimāṇaṃ kalayati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:82: iti prāyo bhāvaḥ sphuradavadhimudrāmukulitaḥ satāṃ prajñonmeṣaḥ punar ayam asīmā vijayate //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:83_0: iti / atra sa ca nidhir apām iti sasvaśabdaḥ sarvanāmno nirdeśaḥ / evaṃ rāmagiryāśrameṣv iti prakṛte tasminn adrau kati cid
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:83_1: ity atra jñeyam / atra tu ke cit samarthayante - rāmagiryāśrameṣv iti rāmagiriḥ samāsa upasarjanībhūto buddhāv udrekeṇānavabhāsāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:83_2: kathaṃ sarvanāmnā parāmṛśyate sarvanāmnānusandhir vṛtticchannasyeti pradhānabhūtaparāmṛśyābhiprāyeṇa sthitaṃ yathā samyagjñānapūrvikā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:83_3: sarvapuruṣārthasiddhir iti tad vyutpādyate iti / atrādrāv iti nirdiśyamānam adrimātrapratīter na prakṛtam adriṃ gamayet /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:83_4: tasmād ubhayam atropādeyaṃ yathā atha śabdnānuśāsanam / keṣāṃ śabdānām iti / giriśabdena girau prakrānta adriśabdena paryāyāntareṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:83_5: tv āgatam āsamañjasyaṃ duṣpariharam eveti / udanvacchinnā bhūr ity atra tu udanvataḥ parāmṛśyasya naikaṭhyād yogyatvāc ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:83_6: bhuvaḥ strītvena sa iti parāmarśānarhatvāc ca sarvanāmaparāmarśa eva yukto, na punaḥ svaśabdagocaratvam ity atra duṣṭataiva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:83_7: kiṃ ca samudāyasya kasya cit kena cid vākyena nirdeśe vākyāntare tadavayavasya nirdhāreṇa karttavye tasya samudāyasaya nirdhāraṇaviṣayapratītaye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:83_8: yacchabdena nirdeśe karttavye nirdhāryamāṇasyāvayavasya nirdeśo duṣṭa eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:84: tasmād ajāyata manur navarājabījaṃ yasyānvaye sa sagaraḥ sa bhagīrathaś ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:85: ekena yena jaladhiḥ parikhānito 'yam anyena siddhasaritā paripūritaś ca //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:86_0: atra sa sagaraḥ sa bhagīrathaś ceti yan nirdiṣṭaṃ tasyaiketyādinā nirdhāraṇaṃ vihitam / nirdhāraṇaṃ ca jātiguṇakriyābhiḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:86_1: samudāyād ekadeśasya pṛthak karaṇam / na cātra samudāyaḥ kena cit padena nirdiṣṭaḥ / yaccaikeneti nirdiṣṭam, tan na samudāyaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:86_2: api tv ekadeśaḥ / tataś ca nirdeśyānirdeśād anirdeśyanirdeśyāc cātra duṣṭatvam / evaṃ ca samudāyasyaiva nirdhāraṇaviṣayasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:86_3: yacchabdena nirdeśe karttavye eko yayor jalanidhīn nicakhāna sapta gāṅgaiḥ payobhir abhivarṣitavān dvitīyaḥ iti pāṭhaḥ śreyān /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:87: kva cid yattacchabdāv agrahaṇena vidhyanuvādabhāvena vākyārthaprastāve yadantarānyathākaraṇaṃ tatra duṣṭatvaṃ yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:88: yat tvannetrasamānakānti salile magnaṃ tad indīvaram
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:89_0: iti / atra prathamatṛtīyayoḥ pādayor yattacchabdaparigraheṇa vidhyanuvādabhāvenopanibandhaḥ / dvitīyapādagatatvena tadullaṅghanaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:89_1: doṣaḥ / indīvarāṇāṃ rājahaṃsānāṃ ca bahutvāt sītāsaṃbandhivastūpamitayor indīvararājahaṃsayor vyāvṛttyarthaṃ vidhyanuvādabhāvaparigrahaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:89_2: candrasya tv ekatvāt tadakaraṇam iti ke cit / tad asat / candrasyāpi dvitīyācandrādibhedena bahutvasaṃbhavāt tatrāpi vidhyanuvādabhāvo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:89_3: yuktaḥ / indīvarāṇāṃ vyaktibhedena mukhyo bhedaḥ / candrasya punar ekavyaktirūpasya kālabhedād avasthābhedāc ca bhinnatvam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:89_4: amukhyam iti cen na / bhinnā eva candravyaktayaḥ / anyo hi dvitīyācandro 'nyaś ca pūrṇacandraḥ / ataś caiva dvitīyācandrādivyāvṛttyā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:89_5: pūrṇacandrapratītyarthaṃ mukhacchāyānukārīti viśeṣaṇaṃ dattam / na hi śaśiśabdaḥ pūrṇacandrābhidhāyī, tasya candramātravācakatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:89_6: saṅkhyāvyavahāreṣu candrasyaikatvapratītir iti cet / kva cij jātivyavahāreṣv apīndīvarādīnām ekatvaṃ siddham / tasmāt kavivyavahāre
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:91: masṛṇacaraṇapātaṃ gamyatāṃ bhūḥ sadarbhā viracaya sicayāntaṃ mūrdhni gharmaḥ kaṭhoraḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:92_0: iti / atra viracaya sicayāntam ity atra tacchabdo hetvartho viniveśayitavyas tṛtīyapādādau niveśitaḥ / na ca tatra tasyopayogaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:92_1: kṛtas tatra pratītikuṇṭhatvam utpādayatīti / kva cit pradhānakriyāyās tadādisarvanāmnā parāmṛṣṭasya guṇakriyāyāṃ svaśabdenopādānaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:92_2: duṣṭam eva / yathā pratyāsanne nabhasi iti / atra tasmai iti sarvanāmnā pūrvaprakrānto meghaḥ parāmṛśyata utaitacchlokagato
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:92_3: jīmūtaḥ / tatrādye pakṣe jīmūtagrahaṇam anarthakaṃ pradhānakriyāyāṃ tadā parāmṛṣṭasya pūrvaprakrāntasyaiva meghasyārthataḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:92_4: saṃbandhayogyatvāt / na hi yāvatāṃ yena saṃbandhas tāvatāṃ pratyekaṃ nirdeśaḥ kriyate / ekatra kṛto 'nyatrākāṅkṣādinopajīvyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:92_5: tasmāj jīmūtagrahaṇaṃ na karttavyaṃ, kṛtaṃ pratyuta vastvantarapratītiṃ janayad vairasyam āvahati / atha tacchabdenaitacchokagato
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:92_6: jīmūtaḥ pratyavamṛśyate / tad asat / sarvatrātra prakaraṇe pūrvaprakrāntasyaiva meghasya parāmarśaḥ sthita itīhāpi tathaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:92_7: parāmarśo nyāyya iti punar api jīmūtagrayaṇam anarthakam eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_0: itthaṃ dvitīyaṃ vidheyāvimarśaṃ vivicya tṛtīyam apy atraiva śloke prapañcayitum upakramate - api cetyādinā / prāyeṇeti dvandvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_1: varjayitvā tatra yugapadadhukaraṇavacanatayā sāmarthyaṃ prakārāntareṇa samarthitam / tatrādya iti tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_2: karmadhārayaḥ iti vacanāt / bahuvrīhiḥ samānādhikaraṇānām iti vacanāt prāyeṇa bahuvrīhiḥ samānādhikaraṇaviṣaya eva / susūkṣmajaṭakeśādau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_3: tu vyadhikaraṇānām apīṣyate / tatraiva samānādhikaraṇe padārthe / yadā saṅkhyāyā iti vyadhikaraṇa saṅkhyāpūrvo dviguḥ iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_4: vacanāt / pratiṣedhasyeti nañ iti nañsūtrārambhāt / dvitīya iti vyadhikaraṇaḥ / kārakāṇām iti kartṛkaraṇe kṛtā bahulam ityādinā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_5: saṃbandhasyeti ṣaṣṭhī ityādinā / tatrāpīti kārakasaṃbandhayoge adhistri upakumbham ityādau / svāśrayo viśeṣyam / vidheyadhurām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_6: iti śabdavṛtte yo vidheyaḥ tasya kakṣyāṃ vāstavīṃ vidheyatām ity arthaḥ / anūdyamānakalpatayeti / śābdaṃ prādhānyam anapekṣya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_7: vāstavena prādhānyenety arthaḥ / astam iyād iti ekārthībhāvād vibhaktatvenāpratīter ity arthaḥ / ekatreti vidheyānuvādyagarbhatve /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_8: anyatreti saṃbandhamātrapratipādane / vikalyeteti mahāvibhāṣayā vyavasthitavibhāṣātvād iti bhāvaḥ / ekasyaiveti / viśeṣaṇagatasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_9: prādhānyasya anyasya tadgatasyaivāprādhānyasya / ekasya hīti, aparasya punar iti ca / atra phalabheda ity atra prakrāntaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_10: phalaṃ saṃbandhanīyam / atra codayati virodhasyobhayavastuniṣṭhatvāsiddher atrābhāva uktaḥ / tad asat / tarhi na hi sahānavasthānalakṣaṇo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_11: vastugata eka eva virodhaḥ bhedo, yaḥ śītoṣṇādau labdhavṛttiḥ / kiṃ tarhi parasparaparihārasthitatālakṣaṇo vastvavastutvāśrayo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_12: dvitīyo 'py asti virodhaprakāraḥ / tadā hi yadi vastvāśrayo na saṃbhavati virodho vastvavastutvāśrayas tu kathaṃ na syād /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_13: ataś ca syāt pūrvapakṣavelāyāṃ bhāvābhāvayor evety uktam / naiṣa doṣaḥ / vastvavastvāśrayasya virodhasya tādātmyaniṣedhe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_14: vyāpārāt / yadi nāma prādhānyaṃ, tasyām eva kakṣyāyāṃ svayam aprādhānyaṃ na syād, aprādhānye vā prādhānyam / prādhānyavidheye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_15: punar apekṣāntareṇāprādhānyaṃ kathaṃ na syāt / na syād, yadi śītoṣṇavad dvayor vastutvaṃ syāt / na cātraitad asti vaivakṣikasyāvastutvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_16: yathā rājapuruṣa ity atra rājño vaivakṣikam eva prādhānyaṃ vāstavaṃ punar aprādhānyam eva tadvad atrāpi draṣṭavyam / tad
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_17: ayam atra piṇḍārthaḥ saṃsarganiṣedho 'tra kartavyaḥ / sa ca vastudvayaniṣṭha iti dvayor atrābhāvān naikenāparatra pratiṣedha
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_0: anyeneti viśeṣyābhidhāyinety arthaḥ / anyonyam iti / parasparaviśeṣaṇānāṃ yady api viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa iti viśeṣaṇasya viśeṣyeṇaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_1: samāsa uktaḥ, tathāpi kāṇakhañjādiṣu siddhaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayor yatheṣṭatvād iti vacanenaikasya viśeṣyatvavivakṣām āśritya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_2: parasparaṃ viśeṣaṇānāṃ samāsaḥ samarthitaḥ / tadabhiprāyeṇānyonyam iti saṃbhāvanā / dārasukha iti dārāṇāṃ sukheti tatpuruṣaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_3: kartavyaḥ / bahuvrīhau rājāhassakhibhyaḥ iti ṭac na syāt / he hasteti / mṛtasya śiśor dvijasya ity atra samāsaḥ śaṅkitaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_4: rāmasya pāṇir asi iti tu ṣaṣṭhīsamāsa udāharaṇam / atra kva cit kartṝṇām karmaṇāṃ ca prathamāntānāṃ kvāpi saṃbandhināṃ karmaṇāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_5: ca ṣaṣṭhyantānāṃ kutrāpy āmantraṇānāṃ samāsaḥ śaṅkitaḥ / vakṣyamāṇanayeneti / vyāsaḥ pārāśaryaḥ ityādivicāreṣu / cāpācārya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_6: iti / atra hi tripuravijayitvādyanuvādena cāpācāryatvādividhiḥ / anūdyamānaś cārtho vidheyasyotkarṣam āvahan pratīyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_7: na caivam iti upendravajrasthāne indravajraprayogāt / upagatam asmābhir iti / duḥśravatvam api vṛttasya śabdānaucityam eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_8: tasyāpy anuprāsāder ivetyādivadadbhiḥ / atra yathā ca kāraṇaguṇe ityādigranthaḥ antaraślokaparyantaḥ pratyudāharaṇaṃ yathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_9: taṃ kṛpāmṛdur ity ataḥ pūrvaṃ paṭhitaḥ sāmañjasyaṃ bhajate, pratyudāharaṇaṃ ceti udāharaṇagranthaḥ samañjasa eva syāt / dṛśyate
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_10: ca pustakeṣv evaṃ pāṭhaḥ / tasmād atra jāgaraṇīyam / kāraṇam atra parāśāro jamadagniś ca / tadabhāve hetur iti tacchabdena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_11: samāsaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ / tataś cātra pārāśaryādipadaṃ vyāsādāv utkarṣam arpayat punar uktam / takṣakasarpa iti takṣakaśabdenaivātra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_12: sarpaviśeṣatvāt sarpatve pratīte sarpapadam utkarṣasamarpaṇapravaṇam eveti tadarthasya vidheyatvam / lohitas takṣaka iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_13: yathā takṣakaśabdād eva sarpatvajātiḥ pratītā tadval lohitalakṣaṇo guṇo 'pi tata evāvyabhicārāt pratītaḥ / tatas tau jātiguṇau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_14: vidheyatābhiprāyeṇoktau na samāsa nyagbhāvanīyau / uktanyāyād iti vidheyatvān na samāsaḥ pravartata ity arthaḥ / pakṣo na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_15: cāsty anyas tadatyaye iti / iha dvau pakṣāv ullikhitau takṣakasya svarūpamātrapratipādanaṃ vā lohitākhyaguṇavidhir vā / ubhayatrāpi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_16: kṛtā carcā / tadatyaye ca kathitapakṣadvayātikrame cānyas tṛtīyapakṣo nāstīty arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:95_0: evam iyatā karmadhārayaṃ vicārya bahuvrīhinirūpaṇāyāha bahuvrīhau yatheti / tatas tad iti sthalīkaraṇādi yad viśeṣaṇatayopāttaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:95_1: tat parāmṛśyate / tair vidhyādibhiḥ / tadapratītiḥ utkarṣāpakarāpratītiḥ / pratītibhedahetau samāsāsamāsayoge / pratītisāmarthye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:95_2: karmadhārayādiviṣaye / tadasaṃbhavaḥ pratītibhedāsaṃbhavaḥ / antyāvasthā prāptakāraṇeṣu yuktaiva kāryotpattir ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:95_3: etadabhyupagame dṛṣṭavirodham āha / evaṃ hīti / naiva veti nyāyāviśeṣāt / ardhajaratīyam iti ardhaṃ jaratyā iti samāsāc ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:95_4: tadviṣayā iti cchapratyayaḥ / yathā jaratyā varāṅgaṃ kāmayate mukhaṃ na kāmayate tadvad evety arthaḥ / tat tasya iti tad
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:95_5: iti tasmāt / tau sūryacandramasau / tayor iti anuvādyayos sūryācandramasoḥ / pāramparyeṇeti vidheyatām āha pitāmahatvadvāreṇa /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:95_6: ata eva sūryācandramasāv iti dvandvanirdeśo dvayoḥ spardhitāṃ prakāśayati / urvaśyā ca bhuvā ceti samāsābhāvo varaṇasya mukhyāmukhyatvapradarśanārtham
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:95_7: ekasya vāstavatvād aparasya kaviprauḍhoktiniṣpāditatvāt / iha ceti pratītivaicitryaṃ spaṣṭataram eva dhārayatu matimān iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:95_8: pāścātya sanbandhanāyaṃ janaka iti / atra janakākhyarājarṣiprabhṛtayaḥ pitṛtvāder utkarṣam arpayanti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:96_0: evaṃ bahuvrīhiṃ vicārya dviguṃ vyācaṣṭe dvigau yatheti / niravaśeṣa iti saptatvasaṅkhyāyāṃ vidheyatvena saṃrambhāspadatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:96_1: samāse tu nyagbhāvāt / daśasv iti daśatvasaṅkhyāyā vidheyatvaṃ rāvaṇasya paribhavātiśayaṃ prakāśayati ekasminn api mūrdhani
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:96_2: padanyāsaḥ paribhavāspadaṃ kiṃ punar daśāsv iti / pratyudāharaṇaṃ saptāṅgyām iha yasya sa itītyādipāṭhe / vaiśasaṃ bādhaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:96_3: evaṃ dviguṃ vyākhyāya nañsamāsaṃ vyācaṣṭe nañsamāseti / upadarśitam iti asaṃrabdhavān ity atra vidheyāvimarśavicāre anuktavān
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:96_4: iti noktavān iti vācyam / tatpuruṣe kartrādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ kārakāṇāṃ saṃbandhasya ca krameṇodāharaṇāny āha deśetyādinā / so 'yam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:96_5: iti / atra sa evāyam iti vyākhyā / ahitasaṃbandhināṃ śastrāṇāṃ ghasmarāṇi grasanaśīlāni ata eva gurūṇi / karaṇaṃ pratīti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:96_6: kriyāṃ pratīty arthaḥ / tat tasyeti prakrāntasya viśeṣyasya karaṇasya / tasyeti rāmasya / śauryaṃ balam / nighnaḥ paravaśaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:97_0: anekeṣām iti / anekaśabdasya nañsamāse uttarapadārthaprādhānyād ekavacanaprasaṅgaḥ / satyam kiṃ tu nañprayogaviṣaye ekaśabdasyaikavyatiriktavastuviṣayatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:97_1: yathā abrāhmaṇa ity atra brāhmaṇaśabdasya kṣatriyādigocaratvam / ekavyatiriktaṃ ca vastu kadā cid ekatvoparaktaṃ pratīyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:97_2: kadā cin nijenaiva svarūpeṇa / ādye pakṣe anekam iti bhavati dvitīye tv anekānīti / yathā ca padamañjariḥ patañjaliḥ - pravṛttibhede
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:97_3: prayojakaṃ cittam ekam anekeṣām iti / gurudattam iti guruṇā dattam iti vācyam / tat tasyā iti sītāyā viśeṣaṇabhūtāyāḥ sītākartṛtkāyā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:97_4: gamanakriyāyā ity arthaḥ / gurvartham iti gurave idaṃ gurvartham iti kriyāviśeṣaṇam etat / kriyāviśeṣaṇānāṃ karmatvaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:97_5: ca / īpsitatamatve tu ṣaṣṭhī syāt / arthanakriyāmukheneti arthayata iti nigamanāt / tat tasyeti tad gurvartham iti viśeṣaṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:97_6: tasyārthinaḥ / avamatatām anabhipretatām / avamatatvaṃ garhitatvam / sutanirviśeṣam iti / kriyāviśeṣaṇam eva / pradakṣiṇakriyety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:97_7: atra pradakṣiṇakriyāyā atyayakriyākarmabhūtāyā antarāyahetukopanimittatvāt prādhānyam / evaṃ prathamaprabodhita iti prāthamyasya /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:97_8: tathā yathākāmatvayathākālatvayor jñeyam / yadavalokaneti rūpasampat parāmṛṣṭā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:98_0: svahasteneti karaṇapadam / svahastalikhitānīti svahastaśabdo 'trādarapratītihetukatvena lekhanaṃ praty utkarṣanimittam api
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:98_1: samāse guṇīkṛtaḥ / pūrvavad iti kṛtasamāsavaiśasam / tac ca vipradattam iti pāṭhe / pitāmahapitāmatayeti pitāmaho brahmā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:98_2: pitāmahaḥ pūrvapuruṣo yasya / tayor janmanidhanayoḥ / tadvato janmanidhanavataḥ / tābhyāṃ janmanidhanābhyām / kṭāntād adhikam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:98_3: āsamudrāt kṣitīśānām iti ca vācyam / apādānasamānanyāyatvād avadhir api pañcamyanto 'tra gṛhyata iti pratyudāharaṇopapattiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_0: raṇabhūṣita iti / atra raṇabhuvīti vācyam / śocanīyatāgatiḥ kriyā / tatra samāgamaprārthanā hetutvenopāttā / tasyāḥ saṃbandhidvāreṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_1: saṃbandhitvamukhena kapālina iti viśeṣaṇam / atra saṃbandhiśabdo bhāvavṛttiḥ saṃbandhitve varttate, yathā dvyekayor dvivacanaikavacane
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_2: iti, sudhīram uvāceti / tat tasyā iti / tad viśeṣaṇam / tasyās samāgamaprārthanāyāḥ / tatra śocanīyatāgatau / sāmarthyam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_3: avyabhicāreṇa sampādakatvam / tasya sakaleti tacchabdaḥ kapālina ity asya parāmarśakaḥ / viśeṣyeṇa samāgamaprārthanayety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_4: anena / pratyavaraṃ guṇabhūtam / evaṃ tātasyeti, āryasyeti, skandasyeti, taveti cety eṣāṃ viśeṇaṇānām utkarṣasamarpakatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_5: jñeyam / tasyaiveti gauravadurāropatvanibandhanasya harasya / tacceti prādhānyam / tasyeti harasya / kalpitārthasyeti vistāritakṛtrimatvamātravācino
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_6: 'dhijyatvamātralakṣaṇārthāropāt / aprayuktasyeti uktanayenāsminn arthe kavibhir aprayujyamānasya / guṇāntaralābha iti vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_7: vācyāvacanasya parihārāt / mātreti evaṃ kṛtam ity atra karaṇam / niṣka ābharaṇaviśeṣaḥ / vibhaktyanvayeti śrūyamāṇāyā vibhakter
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_8: ity arthaḥ / tathā ca ṣaṣṭhyā ākrośe iti jñāpakam rūpakam upadeśa iṣyata iti pramāṇāntareṇa loko vedas tathādhyātmaṃ pramāṇaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_9: trividham ity uktarūpeṇa siddhau yau svasya viśeṣaṇasyotkarṣāpakarṣau tadādhāyinām arthād viśeṣyaṃ pratīty arthaḥ / ārthaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_10: vāstavam / alukam āha ṣaṣṭhyā ākrośe ity anena / cintyam iti / etadavagamāya vicāryam ity arthaḥ / samāse ca vibhaktilopād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_11: iti / iha hi vibhaktiśravaṇāśravaṇe vā anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ viśeṣaṇagatayor vāstavayoḥ prayojakatāṃ bhajete / te tu prāyeṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_12: vākyasamāsagatatvenopalabhyamāne samāsasya vibhaktyaśravaṇād vidheyāvimarśatām utpādayataḥ / ata eva samāse 'pi yadi vibhaktiḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_13: śrūyate, tadā na vidheyāvimarśo yathā dāsyāḥ kāmuka ityādau / samāsas tu tatraikapadyādiprayojanatvena kṛtaḥ / tannibandhaneti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_14: utkarṣāpakarṣanibandhanā / evaṃ ca vibhaktyaśravaṇānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvaṃ vidheyāvimarśasya vyāptyā pradarśitaṃ bhavati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_0: evaṃ ca saptaprakāraṃ tatpuruṣaṃ nirūpyāvyayībhāvaṃ nirūpayati - avyayībhāva iti / samāpaṃ viśeṣyaṃ prati dayitasyeti yad
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_1: viśeṣaṇaṃ tat tasya samīpasyeti yojanā / madhyevyometi pāre madhye ṣaṣṭhyā vā ity avyayībhāvaḥ / sa ceti prakarṣaḥ / evam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_2: iyatā dvandvavarjaṃ samāsavṛttir vicāritā / idānīm atideśamukhena kṛttaddhitavṛttir nirūpyate anenaivetyādinā / vivakṣāviśeṣād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_3: ity akārapraśleṣaḥ / sarvaṃ kaṣatīti sarvakūlābhrakarīreṣu kaṣaḥ iti khaco 'yaṃ viṣayaḥ / bibhartti yaḥ iti kukṣiṃbhariś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_4: ca iti nipātitasya kukṣimbhariśabdasyāyaṃ gocaraḥ / vidhun tud iti vidhvaruṣos tud iti khaśpratyayasthānam / śīrṣacchedam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_5: iti śīrṣacchedād yac ca iti taddhitasya yat pratyayasyedaṃ padam / tair iti kaṣaṇādibhiḥ / sarvārthasyeti, kāyopalakṣaṇasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_6: kukṣer iti, vidhoś ceti vyakta sthitaḥ utkarṣam ādadhatāṃ prādhānyena vivakṣety atra sāmastyena yojanīyam / śīrṣacchedasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_7: ceti utkarṣam ādadhataḥ prādhānyena vivakṣeti saṃbandhanīyam / pūrvebhyo 'sya pṛthaṅnirdeśas taddhitavṛttiviṣayatvena bhinnajātīyatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_8: atra ca sarvārthādīnāṃ caturṇām utkarṣādhāne samanantaranirdiṣṭa bhuvanābhayetyādicatuṣṭayaṃ krameṇa hetutvena draṣṭavyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_9: tad apīti caritam / kaṣaṇādikartṛṣv iti khalaudarikarāhuṣv ity arthaḥ / rāmo 'smi sarvaṃ saha iti / pūssarvayor dārisahoḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_10: iti khaco 'yaṃ viṣayaḥ / daśarathasya hi prasūtir asāv iti tasyāpatyam iti stracpratyaye taddhite kṛte dāśarathiśabdasyāyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_11: gocaraḥ / vākye tu yady apīti tad uktam - kriyāpradhānaṃ guṇavad ekārthaṃ vākyam iṣyate iti / anya iti vakṣyamānanyāyena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_12: śabdakṛtasāmarthyoktiḥ / sa iti pradhānabhāvenety atra nirdiṣṭaḥ pradhānabhāvaḥ śabdārthasāmarthyavivakṣākṛtānāṃ trayāṇām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_13: apīti śabdakṛtaṃ śabdasaṃskāramahimnā niṣpannaṃ yathā karmadhārayād uttarapadasya / arthasāmarthyakṛtaṃ vastuvṛttaniṣpāditaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_14: yathā grahaṃ saṃmārṣṭītyādau grahādeḥ / tasya saṃskāryatvena vastutaḥ prādhānyam / vivakṣākṛtaṃ prayoktṛyadṛcchāpratipāditaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_15: yad anyasyotkarṣāpakarṣādhānatayā vivakṣitaṃ yathā rāmasya pāṇir asi ityādau rāmādeḥ / tatra triṣu prādhānyeṣu vivakṣākṛtam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_16: eva grādhānyaṃ pradhānam / tatkṛtatvāt kāvyārthacamatkārasya / ata evoktaṃ tayoḥ samaśīrṣikābhāvād iti / tayor iti śabdārthasāmarthyakṛtayoḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_17: vivakṣākṛtena sahety arthāt / nanu pūrvaṃ śābdasyaiva prādhānyasya vaivakṣikatvam uktam anyasya tu vāstavatvam / tat katham
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_18: iha śābdavaivakṣikayor anyatvam ucyate / anyatve vā prādhānyatrayapratipādane 'rthasāmarthyakṛtavivakṣākṭayoḥ ko viśeṣaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_19: śabdakṛtād dhi prādhānyād anyadarthasāmarathyakṛtam ucyate / tena vivakṣākṛtasya uktatvāt / tat kim arthasāmarthyakṛtam avaśiṣyata
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_20: iti / naiṣa doṣaḥ / pūrvaṃ hi śābdikaikagocarasya śābdikavivakṣākṛtatvād vaivakṣikatvam / anyasya tu kavigocarasya vāstavatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_21: tad evārthatvam / iha punaḥ sahṛdayaikagocarasya kavivivakṣāvaśād vaivakṣikatvam ucyate / śābdikaikaviṣayasya śābdatvam ity
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_22: apekṣābhedāt pūrvas tāvan na virodhaḥ / yad api prādhānyatrayapratipādane 'rthasāmarthyavivakṣākṛtayor bheda uktas tatrāyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_23: bhāvaḥ - iha śābdaṃ vāstavaṃ ceti dvividham eva prādhānyam / vāstavatvasya ca vivakṣānapekṣatvena vastusāmarthyaprayojaka+++darthasāmarthyakṛtatvam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_24: uktam / saty api śabdakṛtād anyatva utkarṣāpakarṣapratipādanaprayuktakavivivakṣākṛtatve vāstavam eva vivakṣākṛta pratipāditam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_25: tathā ca grahaṃ saṃmārṣṭīti vaidikaṃ vivakṣānapekṣam arthasāmarthyakṛtasyodāharaṇaṃ dattam iti viṣayavibhāgavyavasthiter
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_26: na dvitīyo 'pi virodha iti samañjasaṃ sarvam / evaṃ kṛttaddhitavṛttiviṣaye ātideśikaṃ guṇapradhānabhāvaṃ vicārya samāsagatatvenaupadeśikaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_27: prakṛtam anusandhatte tad idam atreti / sarūpāṇām iti dvandvasamāsasamānanyāyatvād ekaśeṣavṛttir api svīkṛtā / viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvābhāve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_28: 'pīti samāsoṭṭaṅkanikāyāṃ prāyagrahaṇaprayojanaṃ prakāśayati / rūpaṃ ca kāntiś ca vidagdhatā ceti, amṛtena viṣeṇeti cābhihitānābhihitakartṛvibhāgenodāharaṇadvayam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_29: rūpam ityādau hi gamyamānabhavanakriyāpekṣaṃ rūpādīnāṃ kartṛtvam / etena tatpuruṣasya kartrudāharaṇaprastāve kartrādīnāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_30: kārakāṇām anekeṣām iti yad uktaṃ, tat samīhitam. kaś ca kaś ceti / atraikaśeṣo na kṛtaḥ / kṛtaikaśeṣam iti kāv iti prayoge /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_31: adhunā pradhānetarabhāvāpattiṃ darśayati yatra punar iti / bhavata iti ripustrīṇāṃ saṃbandhitvena, ripustrīṇām iti stanayugasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_32: saṃbandhitveneti yojanā / ripustrīṇām iti samāsasyodāharaṇam / na cātra saṃbandhamātrād atiriktaṃ pratīyate / tadartham eveti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_33: upamotprekṣādayo 'py alaṅkārāḥ upamotprekṣādīnām utkarṣam apakarṣaṃ vā pratipādayituṃ vidhīyante / anyathā tadviracanaṃ niṣprayojanaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_34: syāt / tau vidheyeti / utkarṣāpakarṣau / samāsa iti sā samāsa iti vivakṣā parāmṛśyate / vaidarbhīti yady api vāmanamate asamāsā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_35: pāñcālī, madhyamasamāsā tu vaidarbhī, tathāpi matāntare viparyayaḥ sthita iti tadabhiprāyeṇehāsamāsā vaidarbhī kathitā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_36: kārikāmadhya eva saṃbandhamātrapratītau samāsasyodāharaṇam / ūrdhvākṣitāpeti / atra caturthapādaikaśeṣadeśayuktasya pādatrayasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_37: samāse saṃbandhamātraṃ pratīyate, notkarṣāpakarṣau / vākyāt tūbhayam iti ubhayaṃ saṃbandharūpam utkarṣāpakarṣarūpaṃ ca vastv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_38: ity arthaḥ / atrodāharaṇaṃ me yadaraya iti samāse hi madaraya iti syāt / na cāsmād atiśayaḥ pratītaḥ / nanu padād uttarapadayor
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_39: yuṣmadasmadoḥ temayāv ekavacanasya iti temayāv ādeśāv uktau / na cātra padāt paro 'smacchabdaḥ / evaśabdaḥ padam iti cen
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_40: na / tatprayoge nacavāhāhaivayukte iti niṣedhād bhinnavākyagatatvāc ca / samānavākye hi nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśāḥ / etenaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_41: vyatiriktaṃ padāntaraṃ pratyuktam / utkarṣamātram eva śabdādeśaḥ atra ke cid āhuḥ vākye tāvad rasapratītir nirvyūḍhā / tām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_42: anupamaradayan kāvye yady asādhuśabdo 'pi syān na tadā sthūlaḥ kaś cid doṣaḥ / kāvye hi rasapratītiḥ pradhānam / tadanirvāhe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_43: kāvyam eva na syāt / apaśabdaprayoge tu lakṣaṇāsmaraṇamātram / tad uktaṃ -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:101: nīrasas tu prabandho yaḥ so 'paśabdo mahān kaveḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_0: iti / anye tv āhuḥ / bhavatu rasāpekṣayāpaśabdasya svalpadoṣatvaṃ, tathāpi mahākavīnām apaśabdaprayogo mahān doṣaḥ / tenātra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_1: temeśabdau nipāteṣv iti tādṛśo vibhaktipratirūpako meśabdo nipāto, yathā ahantā ahaṃyur ityādāv ahaṃśabdaḥ / tataś ca nātra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_2: kaś cid viśeṣa iti / kiṃ sarvātmanā karaṇasya duṣṭatvam eva / nety āha kin tv iti / etasya samāsasya / antareṇeti vīraraudrādeḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_3: samāsena prakāśyatvāt / vṛttaṃ vasantatilakādi / vṛttayaḥ kaiśikyādyāḥ upanāgarikādyāś ca / kākuḥ kākvadhyāyalakṣito dhvanivikārarūpo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_4: vā / vācikābhinayo vāgvikārarūpo 'nubhāvaḥ / ardhāntāvadhir iti ślokāpekṣayā ardham antāvadhiḥ / nyūneti padyāpekṣayā nyūnaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_5: rasābhivyaktihetutvam ity arthaḥ / yathā pūrvokta iti ūrdhvākṣitāpetyādau / samāso 'rdhāntāvadhiḥ kāryo nādhika ity anena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_6: vyāvartyasyādhikasya tad udāharaṇam / tasyeti padārthānāṃ parasparasaṃbandhaś cen na cchidyate tadā tasya samāsasya madhye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_7: vicchedo na kārya ity arthaḥ / avyabhicārād iti vidheyatvaṃ hi prādhānyāvinābhāvaḥ / sneham iti / atra pānādīnām prakāśanasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_8: ca vidhyanuvādalopitvaikakartṛkāṇāṃ prādhānyabhāvo nāpasmṛtam atra ca yo 'yam iti yacchabdena dīpasya padārthasya parāmarśopakrame
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_9: tattamasa iti tacchabdena vākyārthasya parāmarśo duṣṭa ity upapāditaṃ prāk / śaktiḥ sāmarthyam āyudhabhedaś ca / tārakāḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_10: jyotīṃṣi daityaviśeṣaś ca tārakaḥ / adho nistejastvena vāhanatvena ca / śikhīvahnir mayūraś ca / candrasya suvarṇasya saṃbandhī
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_11: kāntāvabhāso lasan dedīpyamāno yasmin / candrakāṇāṃ mecakānām avabhāso lasanaṃ sphurad yasya / andhakāre tamasi andhakārer
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_12: harasya / guhaḥ kumāraḥ / apara iveti atrāparaśabdasāmarthyād bhūpe dvitīyaguhatvapratītau vastutas tadasaṃbhave tatsaṃbhāvanāyām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_13: utprekṣā / aparaśabdābhāve tu svasvarūpasthitasyaiva vāstavasya guhasya pratītāv iyam upamā syāt / evam apara iva pākaśāsano,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_14: maurvīṃ dvitīyām ityādau ca mantavyam / aharpater iti / aharādīnāṃ patyādiṣu iti vacanād rephaḥ / atra dhāraṇādīnāṃ guṇabhāvaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_15: ādhārasya tu prādhānyam / karttā hi guṇakriyā niṣpādayan pradhānakriyām aidamparyeṇa niṣpādayati, na tu tāsv aidamparyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_16: yatra sarvāsv aidamparyaṃ tatra bhavaty eva sarvāsām ākhyātavācyatvam / yathā saudhād ityādi / itarad aprādhānyam / ādyā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_17: pradhānabhūtā / aparā aprādhānyavatī / bahulagrahaṇam iti viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa bahulam ity atra / kva cid ityādi / kva cit
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_18: pravṛttiḥ kva cid apravṛttir iti bahulagrahaṇaprayojanasya vyavasthitatvāt / utargeti samāsavidhiḥ sāmānyarūpatvād utsargaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_19: prādhānyādivivakṣānimittaś ca tatpratiṣedho viśeṣarūpatvād apavādaḥ / apavādasyaiveti / apavādaviṣayaparihāreṇotsargasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_20: pravṛttir iti nyāyāt / kartum aśakya iti / avyavasthitaviṣayatvāt / yathā utsargasya ghañy amanuṣye bahulam ity atra / pariśabde
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_21: tv ayaṃ bhavati / parivādaḥ parīvāda iti / vivāda ity atra naiva bhavati / tadviṣayaḥ syād iti kṛtyalyuṭo bahulam ityādigatasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_22: bahulagrahaṇasya vidhyanuvādabhāvaviṣaye sāmarthyābhāvāt samāsābhāva iti bhāvaḥ / tadabhiprāyam iti ācāryābhiprāyam / sāpekṣatāmidīti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_23: ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣa ityādau / tat samarthagrahaṇam / etadvyāvṛttīti etacchabdena pradhānetarabhāvaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ / tasyehārthatvam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_24: apīti samarthagrahaṇaṃ pradhānetarabhāvaviṣayanivṛttyartham apīty arthaḥ / vidheyoddeśyeti uddeśyo 'trordhvanirdeśārhatvād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_25: anuvādyaḥ / yat teneti / yacchabdaḥ pūrvārthasaṃbaddhaḥ / tenāpāraṇena / anabhidhānaṃ veti abhidhānalakṣaṇā hi kṛttaddhitasmāsā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_26: iti / samarthagrahaṇaṃ ca veti / caśabdo 'trātiriktaḥ, samuccayavikalpayor virodhāt / evaṃ ca -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:104: dṛṣṭir nāmṛtavarṣiṇī smitamadhuprasyandi vaktraṃ na tan nārdrārdraṃ hṛdayaṃ na candanarasasparśāni cāṅgāni vā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_0: ity atra cavāśabdadvayaṃ pratyuktaṃ, cavāśabdārthayor ekatra virodhāt / khaṇḍiketi khaṇḍo granthasaṃbandhī na tu samasto
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_1: granthaḥ / sa vidyate yeṣām / anavagatatadabhiprāyair iti samarthagrahaṇaṃ praty ācāryasya hi tair abhiprāyo nāgataḥ / abhidhānādhānoddhāreti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_2: abhidhānānāṃ śabdānām ādhānam abhinavānāṃ nyasanam / uddhāraḥ pūrvakāṇām uddharaṇam / śālīnā adhṛṣṭā avicārakā ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_3: aparam apīti punaruktādikam / taccinteti / prādhānyetarabhāvena samāsāsamāsacintā / prakaraṇeti / yatrārthaprakaraṇādinā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_4: śabdasya vācyo 'rthaḥ prakarṣāpakarṣādikam arthāntaraṃ prakāśayati, tatrābhipretārthavināśabhayāt samāso na karttavyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_5: yathā rāmasya pāṇir asi iti / prakaraṇaśabdādisakha iti pāṭhe śabdasyānyasya sannidhir iti svīkṛtam / yadā prakaraṇakākvādisakha
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_6: iti pāṭhaḥ, tadā kākugrahaṇena svaraviśeṣa ucyate yaḥ kālo vyaktisvarādayaḥ iti kāvyagatatvena svīkṛtaḥ / evaṃ prasaktānuprasaktikayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_7: samāsagatatvena tadatideśena samagrapravṛttigatatvenāpi guṇapradhānabhāvavivakṣāṃ mahatā prapañcena parighaṭayya prakṛtodāraṇe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_8: ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣagatatvena yojayitum āha ittham avasthita iti / ambikāyā upādānam iti saṃbandhaḥ / tat kim iti / viśeṣaṇasyānyakesarivyāvṛttir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_9: vā, kesarigataprakarṣapratipādanaṃ vā phalam / ādye pakṣe nirdiṣṭacamatkārasambhāvanā / dvitīye tu samāsānupapattir iti tātparyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_10: vivakṣitapadaṃ camatkārātiśayapadena yojanīyam / tasyā ity ambikāyās sakāśāt / jātyantaraṃ viśiṣṭāvāntarakesarijātiḥ / tayāvacchinno
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_11: viśiṣṭaḥ / viśiṣṭa eveti lokottaraḥ / mohantv iti harer vihaṅgamo garuḍaḥ / moham ajñānaṃ hantv ity arthaḥ / garuḍajātyavacchinna
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_12: iti / saugatadṛśā garuḍānāṃ bahutvād iti bhāvaḥ / vihaṅgamaviśeṣatvaṃ tu jātyādivailakṣaṇyāt / svābhiprāyāviṣkaraṇam iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_13: sādṛśyamūlayāprastutapraśaṃsayeti bhāvaḥ / tasyāś ceti tacchabdena sarasvatī parāmṛṣṭā / sarasvatyā ambikā pratibimbam ātmanaś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_14: ca kesarīty arthaḥ / dvitīyapakṣa iti / kesarigataprakarṣapratipādanapakṣe /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_0: samāsād asāv iti ambikākesariśabdād unmiṣaty eva sa camatkāra ity arthaḥ / udayāstamayeti / vṛttau camatkārasyāstamaya vākye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_1: udaya iti cūlikākrameṇa yogaḥ / upadarśitam eva prāg iti udāharaṇapratyudāharaṇapradarśanadvāreṇa / iṣṭaṃ hīti abhipretasyāprāptir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_2: yā, sā codanārhā iṣṭam etan na sidhyatīti / yat tu nābhipretaṃ tasyāprāptir bhūṣaṇaṃ, na tu dūṣaṇam ity arthaḥ / asmābhir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_3: asāv iti asau camatkāraḥ / sā bhrāntir eveti nirvikalpavikalpabhedena dvividhā bhrāntiḥ / tatrādyā timirādyupaplutendriyasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_4: dvicandrādipratītirūpā / dvitīyā tv abhimānarūpā śuktirajatādipratītisvarūpā / seti camatkārāvagatiḥ / vyākhyāvākyād eveti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_5: ambikāyāḥ kesarīti samāsavivaraṇavākyāt / teṣām iti pratītivaicitryānabhyupagamavādinām / tatrāropiteti tatra samāse śuktisthānīye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_6: rajatam ivāropitāvāstavīty arthaḥ / udayāstamayapakṣau kramād vākyasamāsagatau / udyoga iti / saṃrambhapadaṃ nirasyodyogapadakaraṇaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_7: prakramyamānodyuktavat padakramābhedāya / yo 'sāv ity adaḥśabdaḥ prasiddhiparāmarśakaḥ yacchabdapratinirdeśasya tacchabdena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_8: kariṣyamāṇatvāt / pratipāditeti / ārtho hi kevalatacchabdasya prayoganibandhana upakramopasaṃhārakramaḥ pratipādita eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_9: rajaś chaleneti / chalevaśabdaprayoge sāpahnaveyam utprekṣā / kevalacchalaśabdaprayoge 'py apahnutiḥ / kevalevaśabdaprayoge
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_10: ca sambhāvanapratītāv utprekṣā / dvayaprayoge tu śabalā pratītiḥ / na cātrāpahnutyutprekṣayoḥ saṅkaraḥ / utprekṣā hy apahnutyavinābhāvinī /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_11: so 'pahnavaḥ kva cid garbhīkṛto yathā nakhakṣatānīva vanasthalīnām ity atra, na palāśāni, kin tu sambhāvayāmi nakhakṣatānīti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_12: pratīteḥ / kva cit tu śabdena pratipādyate yathā adhyāruroheveti / evaṃ cāsyā apahnutyavinābhāvinyā apahnutibādhakatvaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_13: na tayā saha saṅkaraḥ / bhinnavākyatāyām eveti / tatra hi vidhyanuvādabhāva āñjasyena krameṇa pratīyate / tad eva veti viśeṣaṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_14: tac ca vidhyanuvādabhāvavivakṣāyāṃ vidheyam / anyatreti / utkarṣāparṣayor vidheyatvasya cābhāve / kāmacāra iti samāsāsamāsayoḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_15: tadartham iti utkarṣādiviṣaye samāsaniṣedhārtham / sāpekṣeti sāpekṣam asamarthaṃ bhavatīty etāvanmātrapratītaye / pitroḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_16: svateveti yathā pitarau vandanīyāv iti nityasaṃbandhanyāyād nijāv eva pitarau pratīyete, tadvat sāpekṣāṇām anabhidhānākhyena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_17: nyāyena samāsābhāvaḥ pratyeṣyate / svatā ātmīyatvam iva / sā doṣaprakāranivṛttiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:107_0: adhunā svotkarṣaśālitāprakaṭanārthaṃ svapariśramaṃ piṇḍīkṛtya ślokena darśayitum āha kāvyakāñcaneti / kāvyam eva parīkṣaṇīyatvāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:107_1: suvarṇaṃ tatra parīkṣāsthānaṃ nikaṣopalam ātmānaṃ manyate, na punar uktakrameṇa parāmarthas san nikaṣopalaḥ / ata eva kuntakeneti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:107_2: khyātasyāpy ulluṇṭhanavacanam / śloka eṣa iti / yaḥ sarvasāratayā pradarśitas tatreyatī dūṣaṇavṛṣṭir muktā / tatrānyasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:107_3: granthasya kā gaṇeneti sūcitam / nidarśitaḥ sthālīpulākanyāyenodāhṛtaḥ / atra śloke vakṣyamāṇaitadīyanyāyānusāreṇa kaṣeṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:107_4: niyamena kāñcanākṣepāt kāñcanapadaṃ paunaruktyadoṣaduṣṭam / nijakāvyalakṣmaṇīty atra nijārthasya saṃrambhāspadatvena vidheyatvāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:107_5: samāsakaraṇaṃ vidheyāvimarśadūṣitaṃ ke cid ācakṣate vicakṣaṇāḥ / tattvenaiva granthakṛtā svakṛtiṣv ayantrita ityādinā dattottaram
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:107_6: eva / asya ca vidheyāvimarśasyānantetaraprasiddhalakṣyapātitvenāsmābhir nāṭakamīmāṃsāyāṃ sāhityamīmāṃsāyāṃ ca teṣu teṣu sthāneṣu
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:107_7: prapañcaḥ pradarśita iti granthavistarabhayād ita evoparamyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:108_0: evaṃ vidheyāvimarśaṃ prakāravaicitryeṇa lakṣayitvā prakramabhedaṃ lakṣayitum āha - prakramabhedo 'pīti / pratipattṛpratīter
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:108_1: iti rathasthānīyā pratipattṛpratītiḥ / utkhāto viṣamonnataḥ pradeśaḥ / enam iti śabdārthavyavahāram / tadviṣayabhāvaḥ prakramabhedaviṣayatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:108_2: anabhibhāṣaṇaṃ tatkartṛkabhāṣaṇābhāvaḥ / evam anālapanaṃ jñeyam / analam asamarthā / vidhyanuvādabhāvaprakāratopagamād iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:108_3: prakāraḥ sādṛśyam / upakrāntaṃ hy anuvādasthānīyam / nirvāhakaṃ ca vidheyaprakhyam / tatra spaṣṭaṃ vidheyānuvādyaprakāram
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:109: tadā jāyante guṇā yadā tais sahṛdayair gṛhyante /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:111: evam eva janas tasyā dadāti kapolopamāyāṃ śaśibimbam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:112: paramārthavicāre punaś candraś candra iva varākaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:113_0: utkarṣāpakarṣamātreti kamalānām utkarṣavivakṣā / candrasya punar apakarṣavivakṣā / ata evodāharaṇadvayaṃ dattam / prakramabhedaprakāra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:113_1: iti prakāro 'tra viśeṣaḥ / paryāyaprakrameti / candraśabdārthasya śaśiśabdena paryāyāntaranirdeśo na yukto vakṣyamāṇaprakramabhedaprasaṅgāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:113_2: na caivam iti tenaiva śabdenopasaṃhāra ity arthaḥ / tayor iti prakramabhedapunaruktayoḥ / asyeti prakramābhedasya parāmarśaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:113_3: tatra hi yathoddeśaṃ pratinirdeśe na paunaruktyam, aikarasyena pratītiprasaraṇāt / uddeśyapratinirdeśyabhāvo na paunaruktyasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:114: kṣāmāṅgyaḥ kṣatakomalāṅguligaladraktaiḥ sadarbhāḥ sthalīḥ pādaiḥ pātitayāvakair iva galadbāṣpāmbudhautānanāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_0: iti / atra galacchabdadvayaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ yathoddeśaṃ pratinirdeśo 'sya viṣaya iti samañjasam / [tayor iti prakramābhedapaunaruktyayoḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_1: asyeti prakramābhedasya parāmarśaḥ /] nanu vrajataḥ kva tāta! vajasīty atra vrajinā prakrame vajinā ca nirvāhe kathaṃ na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_2: prakramabhedaḥ / vajatir api dhātur asti / vaja vraja gatāv iti pāṭhād ity āśaṅkyoktaṃ vrajata iti / uditaṃ śiśuneti uditam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_3: ity asya viśeṣaṇaṃ paricayagatārtham iti / asphuṭam iti ca / bhāve cātra pratyayaḥ / kāryārthaṃ pathi gacchataḥ paścān nāmodīraṇaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_4: viruddham iti śiśunā lalitavacasā nāmany udīrite jananyāsya bhartsanaṃ kṛtam iti tato 'sya manyur vivṛddha ity atra tātparyārthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_5: evaṃ dhāturūpāyāḥ prkṛte prakramabhedaṃ pradarśya saṃprati prātipadikarūpāyās tasyā madhye ca sarvanāmādīnāṃ prakāravaicitryeṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_6: taṃ darśayati sarvanāmeti / kva cit punaḥ pustakeṣu prakṛtiprakramabhedād anantaraṃ pratyayaprakramabhedodāharaṇaṃ tat paścāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_7: sarvanāmaprakramabhedanirdeśo dṛśyate / tatra ca prkṛter anantaraṃ pratyayasyaiva nirdeśa ucita iti sa eva kathita iti saṅgatiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_8: tataḥ paraṃ prakṛtiviśeṣāṇāṃ pratyayaviśeṣāṇāṃ tatsamudāyānāṃ ca tatprakramabhedo nirūpayiṣyate / uktarītyeti / yas tv ekavākye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_9: kartṛtvenokto yaś cedamādibhir ity atroktena krameṇety arthaḥ / nanu yacchabdena prakrame tacchabdenedamādibhir vā prakrame
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_10: yacchabdena vā katham upasaṃhāra ity āha na caivam iti / anyonyāpekṣe iti / yattador nityābhisaṃbandha ity uktam / evaṃ tacchabdādūraviprakṛṣṭārtheṣv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_11: idamādiṣu prāg ukte yo 'vikalpam ityādau jñeyam / teneti prakṛtopasaṃhāraḥ / idamādīnāṃ parasparāvāntaravaicitrye 'pi sthūladṛṣṭyā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_12: ekārthatvam / atra hīti atra hi kartṛviśeṣaṇadvāreṇaikasya hetutvam aparasya sākṣād iti prakramabhedaḥ / yaśodhigantum iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_13: atra hi tṛtīyātumunoḥ pratītivaiṣamyajanakatvam / vāśabdasyeti / vakṣyati hi tulyakakṣyatayā yatra padārthāḥ iti / apatyavato
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_14: 'pīti yuktaḥ pāṭha iti / atra ke cit samarthayante - viśeṣataḥ snihyanto dṛśyante tat putraśabdasyāpatyaviśeṣavācitve apatyaśabdasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_15: ca sāmānyavācitve 'pi sarvanāmavaśād viśeṣaparyavasāne bhavaty eva prakṛtārthaparipoṣa iti / tad etad asya granthakārasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_16: hṛdayam anālokyaiva, yasmād dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikabhāvenātra vākyārthadvayam upanibaddham / tatra ca dvayor bimbapratibimbabhāvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_17: nirdeśo yujyate / dṛṣṭānte cātra sāmānyopakramaḥ, viśeṣopasaṃhāraḥ, puṣpaśabdasya sāmānyavācitvāc cūtaśabdasya viśeṣābhidhāyakatvād /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_18: viśeṣasya cotkṛṣṭatayaivātṛptiviṣayatvam / dārṣṭāntike aniṣṭam viśeṣopakramaḥ / sāmānyopasaṃhāraḥ / sarvanāmavaśād vā viśeṣāntaranirdeśo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_19: nyāyyaḥ / sthitapāṭhe putraśabdasya viśeṣavācitvam apatyaśabdasya sāmānyavācino viśeṣaparyavasānam / yadā tv apatyavato 'pīti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_20: pāṭhas tadāsya sāmānyopakramo viśeṣopasaṃhāraḥ / dvitīyasyāpatyaśabdasya sarvanāmasaṃbandhena viśeṣaparyavasānād yathaikīyamate
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_21: tasminn adrau kati cid balety atra / api śabdasyārthasaṅgatiś ced dṛśyeva bhrājate / yasya naivāpatyasaṃbandhas tasya mā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_22: bhūt kanyāyām ekasyām atṛptiḥ yasya tv anekāpatyayogas tasya katham ekasminn apatye snigdhatvam iti vismayaḥ / etadartha
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_23: evāpiśabdo jīvati / atṛptikāraṇatvaṃ ca kanyāyāḥ parasamarpaṇīyatvena / guṇagauraveṇa ca snehapātratā / etadartham asyāś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_24: cūtena pratibimbanam / tad ittham apatyavato 'pīty eṣa eva pāṭhaḥ śreyān / samāsānupapattīti adhikaṃ na tu taddhānir iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_25: nyāyena guṇāntaralābha ity arthaḥ / varaṃ kṛteti / kṛtāḥ śikṣitāḥ santo dhvastā naṣṭā guṇā yasya / amaṇir avidyamānamaṇir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_26: alaṅkāraḥ / upalaśabdenātra maṇir eva vivakṣitaḥ / tannātra maṇiśabdaḥ prayukta iti paryāyaprakramabhedatvam / kham iveti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_27: haṃsaś candra iva candra iva haṃsa iti yuktaḥ pāṭhaḥ / maghona indrasya sute 'rjune / vīryaṃ ca vidvatsv iti / vīryavedanaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_28: cety eva hetutvena vivakṣitam / samuccayo vikalpo veti / vikalpo yaśo 'dhigantum ity atrodāhṛtaḥ / samuccayasya tv idaṃ vīryaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_29: cety udāharaṇam / vidvatsu vīryaṃ tanaye iti pāṭhe na vedanaṃ hetutvena vivakṣitam, api tu vastusvarūpapratipādanaparatvenety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_30: ayaṃ manyate / evaṃ ca vidvatsv iti viśeṣaṇasya nairarthakyam āpadyata iti nānena vicāritam / duṣkūlabhāva iti / sāmānādhikaraṇyenopakrame
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_31: vaiyadhikaraṇyena pratinirdeśaḥ prakramabhedāvahaḥ atra caturthe pāde / kapālam evāmalaśekharaśrīr ity atra kapālānāṃ bahutve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_32: vācye yad ekatvavacanam amalaśekharaśrīr ity atra ca śekharamātre dharmiṇi vaktavye yacchekharaśrīr iti dharmavacanaṃ tad
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_33: anupapannam eva gantavyam / evaṃ ca pūrvokteṣu vakṣyamāṇeṣu codāharaṇeṣu saṃbhavann api vicāro granthavistarabhayān na niravaśeṣatayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_34: kṛta iti tatraivābhiyogaḥ kartavyaḥ / tadupetam iti / svaśabdena sarvanāmnā vā nirdeśas tulyaphala iti pratipādayiṣyamāṇatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_35: bhagavati yuṣmatprasādeneti / anena nyāyena paśyata mātaḥ iti vārttike dharmakīrteḥ prayogaḥ pratyuktaḥ / prādhānyābhāvād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_36: ity uktam iti / yatraikakartṛkānekā prādhānyetarabhāk kriyā ity atra / anenijur akṣālayan / jakṣur akhādan / bisaprasūnaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_37: padmam / nejanādāv iti liṭā bhūtānadyatanaparokṣaprakrame anenijur iti tu bhūtānadyatanena nirvāhaḥ / tathā dhṛtavikāsīty
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_38: atra bhūtamātre ktapratyaya ity atrāpi kālaprakramabhedaḥ / tatropari tiṅantaprakramabhedo dvitīyo 'tra na sthitaḥ / evaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_39: cehādigrahaṇena dhṛtavikāsīti gṛhyate / anenijur iti atra vikacam asya dadhuḥ prasūnam iti samādhānaṃ na kṛtaṃ prakārāntareṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_40: samarthayiṣyamāṇatvāt / yadi vetyādināmuṃ prakramabhedaṃ nirākaroti / ajayad iti atra parokṣo 'pi jayo darśanārhatvāt parokṣatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_41: na vivakṣita iti liṭprayogo na kṛtaḥ / vidyamānasyāsyāvivakṣāyāṃ dṛṣṭāntam āha anudarā kanyeti / na hi kasyāś cit kanyāyā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_42: udarābhāvaḥ kṛśatvāt punas tad api vivakṣyate / evaṃ ca -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:116: abhūdabhūmiḥ pratipakṣajanmanāṃ bhiyāṃ tanūjas tapanadyutir diteḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:117: yam indraśabdārthaniṣūdanaṃ harer hariṇyapūrvaṃ kaśipuṃ pracakṣate // ityādeḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:118: tāta tvaṃ nijatejasaiva gamitaḥ svargaṃ yadi svasti te kiṃ tv anyena hṛtā vadhūr iti kathāṃ mā sakhyur agre kṛthāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:119: rāmo 'haṃ yadi rāghavas tad akhilaṃ vrīḷānamatkandharaṃ sārdhaṃ bandhujanena sendravijayī vaktā svayaṃ rāvaṇaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:120_0: ityādeś ca mahataḥ kāvyapravāhasya na kiṃ cid duṣṭatvam / arthasyeti tadbhāvo 'rthatvaṃ sattā atadbhāva asattvam / yatreti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:120_1: pūrvārdhaśeṣaḥ / yatheti / na prakramabheda ity anvayaḥ / tatra kālaviśeṣo darśitaḥ / yathā bhūtasya bhāvinaś ca kālasyādyatanānadyatanatve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:120_2: parokṣāparokṣatve ca vaivakṣike eveti / te śīlādayo 'rthāḥ ā kves tacchīlataddharmatatsādhukāriṣu ity atra nirdiṣṭāḥ / teṣāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:120_3: ca vaivkṣike sattvāsattve / evaṃ ca kva cit tācchīlikādipratyayaprayoge 'py anyatra tadakaraṇam aduṣṭam / yathā -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:122: agṛdhnur ādade so 'rtham asaktaḥ sukham anvabhūt //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_0: ity atrāgṛdhnur iti tācchīlyādyarthapratyayaprayoge 'py atrasta ity atrātrasnur ity akaraṇe 'pi na duṣṭatvam atrasnur iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_1: vā nirdeśe agṛdhnur iti nirdoṣam eva / kartuḥ phalavattā kartrabhiprāyatvam / tad api vaivakṣikam eva / evaṃ ca dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭim
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_2: adho dadāti kurute nālāpam ābhāṣitā ity atra yadi kartrabhiprāyatvaṃ kriyāphalasya, tadā dadātīti parasmaipadānupapattiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_3: na cet tadā kuruta ity atra parasmaipadaprasaṅga iti prakramabhedaparyanuyogo niravakāśa eva / evam anyatra boddhavyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_4: tena te iti / te kālaviśeṣādayaḥ tena vivakṣāprayuktatvena kāraṇena na darśitā ity arthaḥ / gāhantām iti / atra kartur ākhyātenābhidhānaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_5: karmaṇaś cānabhidhānaṃ prakrāntaṃ visrabdhair ity anyathākṛtam iti kārakaprakramabhedaḥ / vihṛtiṃ viharaṇaṃ bhaṅgibhājanatvam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_6: ity arthaḥ / vivṛtam iti pāṭhe vistaraśālitvam ity arthaḥ / ratau vigraho virodhaḥ stanatair vyavahitas tatprasādād virodhasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_7: kartum aśakyatvāt / vitene iti bhāve pratyayaḥ / stanitāni vitatībhūtānīty arthaḥ / śābdaḥ prakramabheda iti śabdaviṣayatvāc
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_8: chābdaḥ / śābdaprakramabheda iti tu prakṛtiprakramabhedasyānukrameṇa ye paṭhanti taiḥ śābdaś cārthaś cottaro grantho nālocita
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_9: ity upekṣyam etat / saṅgamabhūṣeti / atra buhuvrīhāv anyapadārthopasarjanenārthena krameṇopasaṃhṛtam iti / bhidyamānaśabdaviṣayatvāc
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_10: chābdaḥ prakramabhedaḥ / evam ārthaḥ prakramabheda ity atra prathamaprakrāntabhidyamānārthaviṣayatvād ārtha iti vyākhyeyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_11: dhṛtavikāsīti pūrvaṃ kālaprakaraṇenodāhṛtam, saṃprati śābdaviṣayatvenodāhriyate, tiṅantagatatvenāpy ūhyate / na hīyam ārthaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_12: prakramabheda iti atrodāharaṇadvitayaṃ dattaṃ mattateti samatayeti / tatra mattatety atra saṅgamabhūṣety ārthena krameṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_13: prakramaḥ, bhūṣayatīty atra tu śābdarūpatayā pratinirdeśa ity ārthaḥ prakramabhedaḥ / kiṃ tu tadvapus tad api cārutaratvam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_14: iti pāṭhaḥ sthitaparipāṭhyānuguṇyābhāvān na nyāyyaḥ / cārutā sa khalu sāpi śarīram iti tu pāṭhaḥ śreyān / evaṃ ca dayitasaṅgatir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_15: eṣety etacchabdaḥ paṭhanīyaḥ, na punar āsām iti pāṭhaḥ / tatra hi mattatā kena śabdena parāmṛśyate / samatayety etat prāyeṇādarśeṣu
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_16: śābdaprakramabhede udāharaṇatayā dṛśyate / ārtha prakramabhedaprastāve vā? ca anantarodāharaṇayor ādyam āhitaviparyayam iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_17: pāṭhaḥ / etac cāyuktaṃ yojanagranthe varuṇasyārthaprakrama iti granthavirodhāt / kiṃ tu niyamayann iti vidagdhamanyatayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_18: datto 'pi no hṛdayaṅgamaḥ pāṭhaḥ, varuṇenaiva tat saṃbaddham ity atra pramāṇābhāvāt / na hi varuṇasyānyopasarjanatvena sthitasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_19: svātantryam asti / tasya naivaṃvidhasaṃbandhaḥ puṣṭatvaṃ dhatte / ārthaprakramabhedaprastāve idam evodāharaṇam āhitaviparyayam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_20: iti pāṭhaḥ śreyān / parihṛtau bhavata iti / vibhaktiprakramabhedacaśabdayor dvitvād dvivacanam / caśabdasyobhayathā duṣṭatā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_21: ca / caśabdasya ca samuccayo viṣayaḥ / tadbhāvaḥ uktaḥ / yena tulyakakṣyatvābhāvākyatvena nivāritaḥ / prakramabhedas tv asatām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_22: ity asamuccetavyanikaṭaprayogāt / sa hi niyamanād ity asyānantaraṃ paṭhanīyaḥ / loṣṭasaṃcāra ekaikasya bhedasya bhedāntaraiḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_23: saha saṃyojanaprakārākhyo gaṇanāviśeṣaḥ / prakṛtipratyayayor iti laghuśabdaḥ prakṛtiḥ / tasyāṃ guruśabdena bhedaḥ / guruśabde
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_24: ceyasunn adhikaḥ prayukto, yo laghuśabde na prayuktaḥ / tatpratyayasya ca pratinirdeśo na kṛta iti pratyayaprakramabhedo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_25: 'pi / abhinavapāṭhe tu tatpratyayarahitasyaiva laghuśabdasya pratinirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ / krameti ya uddeśakramaḥ prakrāntaḥ, so
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_26: 'nudeśe vaiparītyād na kṛta iti pratīter aikyasya vigamād duṣṭatvam / tava kusumaśaratvam iti / idaṃ kramaprakramabhedodāharaṇaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_27: na yuktaṃ cūlikākramasyaivātrocitatvam / tathā hy uddeśaḥ / smaraṃ prati sāṃmukhyenābhidhānaṃ vihāya nenduṃ prāsaṅgikaṃ pratyayathārthajñānam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_28: ucitam iti smarasya tāvat prathamanirdeśo nyāyyaḥ / anudeśe tv idaṃ viṣayaṃ tyaktvā na prāsaṅgikena vākyārthaparisamāptiḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_29: śobhate iti pāryavasānikena smareṇaiva saṃmukhīkriyamāṇena vākyārthaḥ parisamapanīya iti pāṭhakramāpekṣayā cūlikākrama eva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_30: sahṛdayahṛdayarañjaka iti kuśāgrīyadhiṣaṇair nipuṇaṃ nirūpaṇīyam etat / tathā ca yuṣmadasmadoḥ padasya padāt ṣaṣṭhīcaturthīdvitīyāsthayor
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_31: vānnāvau iti cūlikākrameṇa vyavahāro dṛśyate / kramaprakramabhedasya punar udāharaṇaṃ vastuprakramabhedavicāraprastāve nirūpayiṣyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_32: pradhānabhūtasyety arthapratipādanāya śabdaprayogāc chabdasyopāyamātratvād upāyānāṃ ca niyamābhāvāt / tad uktaṃ -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:124: upādāyāpi ye heyās tān upāyān pracakṣate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_0: iti / prakramabheda iti / prakramabhedaviṣayasya vidhyanuvādabhāvaprakāratvāt prakramabhedo 'py upacārād vidhyanuvādaprakāra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_1: ity arthaḥ / anenaiva nyāyena śābdaś cārthaś ceti prakramabhedasya bhedadvayaṃ śābdārthaviṣayatvād boddhavyam / śabdabhedam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_2: iti / ekaśabdābhedatvābhidheyatvenārthasya pratyabhijñāyamānatvopapattaye / śabdabhede tasyaivārthasyānyasyeva pratīteḥ nāñjasena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_3: prakāreṇa vidhyanuvādabhāvaviṣayatvam / kāvyagatatvena hi cintā prastutā / na ca kāvye śāstrādivad arthapratītyarthaṃ śabdamātraṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_4: prayujyate, sahitayoḥ śabdārthayos tatra prayogāt / sāhityaṃ tulyakakṣyatvenānyūnānatiriktatvam / astv evam iti sāmānyena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_5: prakramabhedābhyupagamo viśeṣe tu paryanuyoga iti bhāvaḥ / prakramabhedaniyamaṃ pratīti hṛdayaṅgamaḥ pāṭhaḥ / yadbhedābhedābhyām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_6: iti hi yacchabdena prakramaḥ parāmṛśyate / prakramabhedaniyamaṃ pratīti tu pāṭhe yadbhedābhedābhyām iti prakramasyaivoddhṛtasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_7: yathākathaṃ cit parāmarśo vyākhyeyaḥ / śuci bhūṣayatīti / atra bhūṣayatīti śābdaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ prakrāntam alaṅkriyetyādāv ārthena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_8: rūpeṇa pratinirdiṣṭam / atra ca paryāyaprakramabhedaḥ sthito 'pi sāṃprataṃ na cintitaḥ śabdārthaprakramabhedacintanaprastāvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_9: atra vibhāgasyaiveti / atra vety arthād upameyam tadabhisaṃbandhaḥ śabdābhisaṃbandhaḥ / viparyayād iti sākṣāc chabdasaṃbandhābhāvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_10: udāharaṇadvaye śuci bhūṣayati iti cārutā vapur iti ca / yādṛśam iti sthitapāṭhābhiprāyeṇānaucityaṃ dattapāṭhāśayena tv aucityam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_11: ity arthaḥ / tacchabdenānye parāmṛśyante / sādṛśyam eveti / tadā yacchabdasya napuṃsakatā syāt / tasmāt surārivety atra parāmṛśyata
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_12: iti avivekākṣamaprajñatvāt / tadapahṛteti bhaṅgibhaṇitivaicitryaṃ parāmṛṣṭam / utkaṭena bhaṇitivaicitryeṇa varṇanīyam ācchāditam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_13: ity arthaḥ / tad uktaṃ vakroktikṛtā laukikālaṅkārān upamānīkṛtya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_0: iti / aprādhānyaṃ syād iti / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - yadi śabdavyāpāraviṣayasya prādhānyam arthavyāpāraviṣayasya cāprādhānyam iti vyavasthā,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_1: tadā trividhasya pratīyamānasya parair dhvanyatvena vyapanirdidiṣṭasyāsmābhir anumeyatvenopapāditasyāprādhānyaṃ prasajyeta
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_2: tasyārthavyāpāraviṣayatvāt, śabdavyāpāraviṣayatvasya dūṣitatvāt / iṣyate ca prādhānyam / tat katham iyaṃ prādhānyāprādhānyapratītir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_3: ghaṭata iti / cakrābhighātetyādau ca paryāyokte samāsoktivad gamyamānasyaiva prādhānyaṃ na vācyasyety upapāditaṃ prāk / ekābhighāta
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_4: iti hayagrīvavadhe pāṭhaḥ sthitaḥ, sudarśanasya pulliṅgasya prakrāntatvād ya ity anena parāmarśāt / tat tv anavabudhya cakraṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_5: yadi parāmṛśyate, tadā yacchabdasya napuṃsakatā syāt / tan murārir evātra parāmṛśyata ity āśayena cakrābhighāteti paṭhanti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_6: na tv ayaṃ tatra prastāvaḥ / tadapekṣayaiva prādhānyam aprādhānyaṃ ceti iha gamakam apradhānam upāyatvāt / gamyaṃ pradhānam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_7: upeyatvāt / tena pratīyamānasya gamyatvāt prādhānyavyavahāraḥ / na pratītyapekṣayeti / śabdenārthena ca yā pratītis, tadapekṣayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_8: na prādhānyāprādhānyavyavahāra ity arthaḥ / tayas tv iha gamyagamakabhāvaviviktaviṣayatvena cintā kṛtā / tadapekṣayaiva ceti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_9: vācyasyāpi yaḥ śābdatvena prādhānyavyavahārayogas tasyāpi / tadapekṣayā gamyagamakatvāpekṣayā / kva cid yatra pratīyamānasadbhāvas
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_10: tatrāprādhānyam ity arthaḥ / vācyaṃ hi pratīyamānaṃ prati gamakatvena vyavasthitaṃ tena tadapekṣatvenāprādhānyam iti tātparyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_11: vicitrā bhaṅgibhiṇitaya iti yathā bhaṭṭabāṇasya teṣu teṣu sthāneṣu / abhibhūyamānatvād iti / yad uktaṃ dhvanikṛtā
