GK16ruvyavivya_pu:131_0: iti / vākyabhedāc ceti vākyāntarāpekṣayā hi vākyāntarasya bhaṅgibhaṇitivaicitryam ity aṃśena pratītivaidūryān na prakramabhedadoṣaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:131_1: prakāśayati / nyāyasiddhatvād iti / nyāyo 'tra bhaṇitivaiṣamyam / kāraṇabhedasyāpīti na kevalaṃ pratītibhedo bhedahetuḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:131_2: yāvat kāraṇabhedo 'pi / pratītibhedo vijñaptyapekṣayā bhedahetuḥ, kāraṇabhedaḥ punar utpattyapekṣayeti viśeṣaḥ / tad uktam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:132: ayam eva bhedo bhedahetur vā bhāvānāṃ yo 'yaṃ viruddhadharmādhyāsaḥ kāraṇabhedaś ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:133_0: iti / iha bhaṅgibhaṇitivaicitryāvaicitrye pratītipariskhalanāskhalanayoḥ kāraṇe / sa ceti prakramabhedaḥ / śābdaś cārthaś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:133_1: ceti pūrvaṃ prakṛtyādiprakramabhedavilakṣaṇau śābdārthaprakramabhedau lakṣitāv udāhṛtau ca / adhunā vācyapratīyamānārthāpekṣayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:133_2: paryavasānābhiprāyeṇa sarvaprakramabhedavyāpakau sāmānyena śābdārthaprakramabhedāv uktāv iti viśeṣo boddhavyaḥ / vastuprakramabheda
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:133_3: iti / vastu varṇanīyaṃ yathā varṇayituṃ prakrāntaṃ tasya tathā nirvāhābhāvād vastuprakramabhedaḥ / bhedeneti avayavasaṃbandhitvenety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:133_4: arthaḥ / prathame hi pāde avayavina eva svarūpeṇa varṇanaṃ prakrāntam ity avayavisaṃbandhitvena nirvāhaṇaṃ doṣaḥ / ubhayatrāpīti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:133_5: avayavivarṇane avayavavarṇane ca / tat svarūpaṃ nāyikāsvarūpam / aṅgena ity āmantraṇam / patatu adhastāt gacchatu / sādṛśyapratipādaneti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:133_6: dvicandram iti hi pāṭhe vadanena saha candro nabhaso dvicandratām āpādayati / tac ca vadanacandrayoḥ sādṛśyamūlam iti vyatirekaprakrame
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:133_7: sādṛśyanirvāhāt prakramabhedaḥ / vastusargapaunaruktyasyeti punaruktavastuvirasa ity atra hi punaruktavastubhir virasa iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:133_8: vyākhyāne sādṛśyena nirvāhaḥ kṛtaḥ / vyatirekeṇa ca prakrama iti doṣa evāyam vimukha iti / ke cit punaruktavastuṣu virasaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:133_9: punaruktāni vastūni na karotīti vyākhyānena vyatirekanirvāhād yathāsthitapāṭhaṃ samarthayāṃ cakre / arthadoṣāṇām iti prakramātikramarūpāṇām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:134: tapena varṣāḥ śaradā himāgamo, vasantalakṣmyā śiśiraḥ sametya ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:135: prasūnakṛtyaṃ dadataḥ sadartavaḥ pure 'sya vāstavyakuḍumbitāṃ dadhuḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_0: atra hi strīpuruṣayugalatrayarūpatayā ṛtūnāṃ varṇane prastute strīrūpāṇām ṛtunāṃ tṛtīyāsaṃbandhād aprādhānye vivakṣite yat
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_1: tapena varṣā ity atra viparyayaḥ kṛtaḥ, kṛte vā tathā nirdeśe śaradā himāgama ityādau yad anyathākaraṇaṃ, sa prakramabheda
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_2: eva / yadi paraṃ strīpuṃsayor atra yena krameṇa prakramaḥ tasyānyathā nirvāhāt kramaprakramabhedam imaṃ vidmaḥ / tena pūrvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_3: kramaprakramabhedasyedam evodāharaṇaṃ deyam / tena varaṃ ghanaśriyoṣṇaḥ śaradā himāgamaḥ iti pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ / kartṛprakramabhedo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_4: 'pīti / yatra yuṣmadasmadarthagataṃ kartṛtvaṃ śeṣe 'tra cetane 'cetane vā vaktrā buddhipūrvakam evāropyate, tatra kartur
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_5: anyasyāropaś cārutvāya vyatyāso guṇa evety arthaḥ / tayor iti / yatra kartṛvyatyāsaprakramabhedayoḥ / na prakaraṇāvasita
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_6: iti / yuṣmadasmadarthasya hi kva cit kartṛtvaṃ prakaraṇādyavasitaṃ na śabdenābhidhātuṃ prakrāntam iti nāyaṃ prakramabhedadoṣasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_7: viṣayaḥ / anyatrāropyaivam uktam iti śeṣatvena vivakṣite rāmabhadre / evam uttaratra bhārgave vaṭau cānyatvaṃ yojanīyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_8: nanu yuṣmadasmadarthasya cetanatvāt tadapekṣayācetanasyaivānyatvam ucitam iti kathaṃ cetanasyaivānyatvam ity āha - dvividho
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_9: hīti / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ / na yuṣmadasmadarthagatacetanatvāpekṣayā vastvantarasyānyatvam, api tu yuṣmadasmadarthatvāpekṣayaiva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_10: yuṣmadasmadarthau ca kramāt saṃbodhyamānavastuniṣṭhaḥ parabhāvo 'smitākhyā pratyaktā ca / tataś ca tadapekṣayā śeṣasyānyatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_11: tasya ca cetanatvācetanatvād dvaividhyam iti na virodhaḥ kaś cit / paraśunā candrahāsa iti krameṇa dvayor api yuṣmadasmadarthayor
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_12: acetanaviṣayakartṛtāvyatyāsa udāharaṇam / bho laṅkeśvara iti / atra rāmaḥ svayaṃ yācata iti asmadarthakartṛtvasya cetanaviṣayavyatyāsasyānyat
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_13: sthitam apy udāharaṇīyaṃ na cintitaṃ, pūrvam udāharaṇāntare cintitatvāt, cintāntaraprastāvāc ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_0: tad evam iyatā prabandhena prakramabhedaṃ vicārya kramaprāptaṃ kramabhedaṃ vicārayitum āha kramebhedo yatheti / nanu yadi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_1: smṛtiparāmarśakasya tacchabdasyānubhūta evārtho viṣaya ity ucyate, ye 'tyantaparokṣā rāmādayas teṣāṃ kavinā kāvye tacchabdena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_2: kathaṃ parāmarśaḥ kriyate teṣām atīndriyatvād ity āha atra ca pratītimātram iti / ayam atrābhiprāyaḥ / yena vinā yan nopapadyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_3: tasya tadapekṣā nyāyyā / smṛtiś ca pratītimātram antareṇānupapadyamānā tadapekṣiṇī syāt, naindriyikapratītyapekṣiṇī aindriyakapratītiṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_4: vināpi śabdādibhyaḥ pratītau tasyāḥ saṃbhavadarśanāt / rāmādīnāṃ ca yadi naindriyikī pratītis tadā śabdāt prasiddher vā pratītir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_5: astu / tannibandhanaś ca smṛtiparāmarśakena tacchabdena parāmarśa iti na kaś cid virodhaḥ / nanv iti / ayam atrārthaḥ / padārthavimarśapurassaro
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_6: vākyārthavimarśa iti na padārthavimarśavelāyāṃ bhavatv iyam āśaṅkā / vākyārthavimarśasamaye tv akhaṇḍapratītau pūrvāparabhāvaniyamāvabhāsanābhāvān
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_7: nāsya doṣasyāvakāśaḥ / uddeśyatvāc ca vākyārthapratīter antaraṅgatvam iti tadāśrayeṇaiva vyavasthopapattau na kramadoṣacintā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_8: kā cid iti / pratirūpaḥ pratibimbarūpaḥ tatsaṃcāro vaktrabhiprāyasaṃkramaṇam / śabdavyavahārasyeti / śabdavyavahāramukhena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_9: śrotṛgṛhīto vākyārthavimarśaḥ svīkṛtaḥ / vaktur iti yadi śortṛvimarśaparyavasāyī śabdavyavahāro vaktṛvimarśapraticchandakarūpo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_10: na syāt, tadā śabdair vaktṛvimarśasyāsaṃbandhitvād anumānaṃ na syād ity arthaḥ / tatra cāsāv iti vaktṛśrotṛgate vākyārthavimarśe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_11: sūkṣmatvenāsphuṭarūpo 'sty eva paurvāparyapratibhāsa iti yāvat / padārthabuddhāv iti vākyārthapūrvabhāsinyām / tatrāpīti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_12: vaktṛśrotṛgatavākyārthavimarśe 'pi sūkṣmaḥ padārthāśrayo doṣo durnivāraḥ padārthān atikrameṇaiva vākyārthavimarśasya vyavasthitatvād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_13: ity arthaḥ / pramādaja iti / evaṃ sati prakraṃsyamānavastuparāmarśadoṣas tāvat parigṛhītā bhavati / pratīpagamanahetor iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_14: gajasetubandhād ity asya / śābdasyeti pañcamyantatvāt / tadīyatīrthābhidhāneti hetuhetumatos tadīyatīrthaśabdena vyavadhāne
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_15: satīty arthaḥ / gaṅgāviśeṣaṇamukheneti gajasetubandhām iti pāṭhe / ayam atrāśayaḥ - śābdo yatra hetuhetumadbhāvas tatra hetutvenāpanyāsān
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_16: na tayor vyavadhānaṃ kiṃ cit kāryam, pratītiviprakarṣaprasaṅgāt / ārthe hetuhetumadbhāve upanyastasya hetutvād viśeṣaṇabhūtasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_17: hetor viśeṣyasvarūpavarṇanena caritārthatvāt saty api vyavadhāne na pratītiviprakarṣaḥ kaś cit, paryālocanasāmarthyād dhetutvapratīteḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_18: atra ca śloke tīrthe tadīye iti padadvayākaraṇe 'pi vākyārthasya nirākāṅkṣtvāt tatkaraṇam apuṣṭārtham eva / tadeti tacchabdena /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_19: iti tacchabdaḥ āropanivṛttāv iti āropo bhramo 'nyasyānyatvena pratītiḥ, yathā navajaladharasya sannaddhadṛptiniśācaratvena /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_20: tannivṛttāv atra vakṣyamānāyām āropaviṣayasya jaladharāder vastusataḥ prakāśamānasyedamādinā nyāyye nirdeśe tasya parāmṛśyasamīpa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_21: eva prayogeṇa bhāvyam / yas tv avastusadāropyamāṇanikaṭe prayogaḥ sa kramabhedam āvahati / yas tv atraivāropaviṣayasvarūpatayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_22: vidyuto nikaṭa idam ādyaprayogaḥ, tatra dūṣaṇāntarāvakāśaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:138: utkhātadrutam iva śailaṃ himahatakamalākaram iva lakṣmīvimuktam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:139: pītamadiram iva caṣakaṃ bahulapradoṣam iva mugdhacandrarahitam //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:140_0: itīveti / atropalambharūpaḥ pūrvavākyārtha itiśabdāvacchinna utprekṣyata ity upālabdhety ataḥ pūrvam itīvaśabdau prayojyau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:140_1: viṣayāntare tu prayogāt kramabhedaḥ / prāpipayiṣupadeneti pūrvavākyārthasthitena / tadadhīnatvaṃ puruṣāyattatvam / stambaram
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:140_2: iti pīnonnatastanadvayadarśanād ayaṃ praśaṃsoktiḥ / ṣidgāḥ viṭāḥ / pratītivaicitryam iti vākyārthasya tilatuṇḍalīkṛtasyāvagamānavagamau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:140_3: uktisvarūpeti / uktiḥ stamberamaḥ pariṇinaṃsur asāv upaiti ity eṣā / tasyā viṭasaṃbandhinyāḥ svarūpam itiśabdenopalakṣaṇatvād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:140_4: evaṃśabdādinā vyavacchettum iṣṭam / ataś ca tatra tasmād itiśabdād itiśabdopalakṣitād evamādayaś ca prāk pūrvam ukteḥ pūrvapradarśitāyāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:140_5: anyat kiṃ cit padaṃ ṣidga ityādi na kathanīyam ity arthaḥ / evam udāharaṇāntare 'pi yojanīyam / upādhibhāvād iti itiśabdasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:140_6: svā śaktiḥ pūrvavākyāvacchedarūpā / tāṃ pūrvatra vākye samarpayaṃs tasyopādhir itiśabdaḥ saṃpadyate / ataś ca na tasyānyatra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:140_7: prayogaḥ karttavya ity arthaḥ / padasyānyasyeti ṣidgair ityādeḥ / anyatheti viṣayāntaraprayoge āsamañjasyaṃ viśarārupratītitvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:143_0: iti nyāyenārthaucityavaśād vyavahitānām apy ānantaryaniyamo bhaviṣyatīty arthaḥ / anyatas tarhīti / anyato 'rthaucityavaśāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:143_1: tatkāryasiddheḥ ityādikarttavyasiddheḥ / iti teṣāṃ prayogo niyataḥ syād ity uktam / nanu yasya yenābhisaṃbandho nyāyyaḥ kutrāvatiṣṭhatām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:143_2: ity āha kaiś cid eveti / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - ityādiśabdavarjanenoktakrameṇa śabdahetvādivarjanena cānyeṣāṃ śabdānām ayaṃ nyāyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:143_3: ityādīnām ayaṃ punar niyataprayogaviṣaya iti / nānyathā teṣāṃ prayogaḥ karttavya iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:144_0: evam uddeśakrameṇa kramabhedaṃ vimṛśya paunaruktyaṃ vicārayitum āha paunaruktyam iti / iha khalu dvividhaṃ paunaruktyaṃ śabdapaunaruktyam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:144_1: arthapaunaruktyaṃ ceti / tad uktam akṣpādamuninā - śabdārthayoḥ punarvacana[ṃ] punaruktam anyatrānuvādād iti / tatra śabdapaunaruktyam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:144_2: arthāpaunaruktye na doṣaḥ, arthapaunaruktyena duṣṭatva[ṃ] arthasyaiva prayojakatvāt / arthapaunaruktyam evaikaṃ paunaruktyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:144_3: na śabdapaunaruktyam iti samudāyārthaḥ / ārtham iti arthāśritam / evaṃ śābdam ity atrāpi vācyam / yad uktam iti vādanyāye /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:144_4: hasatīti eko hasatiśabdaḥ śatrantaḥ svāmiviśeṣaṇam, aparaḥ kriyāpadam / evam uttaratra vācyam / yantram iti / abhedopacāreṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:144_5: bhṛtyasya nirdeśaḥ kṛtānukāritvāt / anyatra tātparyabhedād iti tātparyabhede hi svarūpārthāviśeṣe lāṭānuprāsa iṣṭaḥ / tad
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:146: śabdānāṃ vā padānāṃ vā lāṭānuprāsa iṣyate //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_0: iti / śakrasaṅkāśeti śrīnadīhaṃseti medinīcandreti vidviṣāṃ kāleti ca catvāryāmantraṇāṇi / atra tātparyabhedaḥ sphuṭa eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_1: tathā caikaḥ kāśaśabdo vastrāṇām upameyatvena sthitaḥ, anyas tu hasānām upamānatveneti bhinnaṃ tātparyam / evam anyad api
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_2: yojanīyam / ubhayābhāve iti arthabhedasya tātparyabhedasya cābhāva ity arthaḥ / na ca ghāseti karmatvena saṃbandhitvena cāstu
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_3: tātparyabheda ity arthaḥ / etan na ceti niṣidhyate / svārtham iti / etad uktaṃ bhavati - na svārthābhidhānam eva tātparyam,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_4: api tu saty eva svārthābhidhāne 'dhikam arthāntaronmukhatvaṃ tātparyaṃ, yathā kāśaśabdayoḥ / tatra kāśajātyavacchinnadravyapratipādanād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_5: atirikta upamānopameyabhāvaḥ pratipādyate / na caivaṃbisaśabdayoḥ / na hy atra bisajātyavacchinnadravyātiriktaṃ kiṃ cid vastu
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_6: pratīyate / yat tu karmatvaṃ saṃbandhitvaṃ ca tadabhidheyasyaiva tathāvasthānaṃ nodrekeṇānyatām āvahatīti svaśabdaparihāreṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_7: sarvanāmaparāmarśasyaiva viṣayo nyāyya iti / nanu punaruktaṃ kim ucyate yatra tat prayogaṃ vinārthapratītiḥ yatra ca tatsamānapadāntaraprayogo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_8: 'vaśyam upayujyate, tatra kathaṃ punaruktatvam / yatraikārthena pratītir na tātparyabhedaḥ, tatra punaruktatvaṃ pratītivairasyāpādānāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_9: yatra tu tat samānaṃ padāntaram upayujyatāṃ mā vā / sarvathā tatprayogakṛta vairasyaṃ paunaruktyaprayojakam iti tadāśrayeṇāyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_0: sarvanāmeti jakṣur bisam ity atra nirdiṣṭaṃ bisam uttaratra prasūnasaṃbandhitvena sarvanāmaparāmarśārhaṃ sad yat svaśabdenoktaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_1: tat śabdapunaruktam / yady apy arthapunaruktam evaikaṃ punaruktaṃ prāg uktaṃ tathāpi śabdasya punaruktatety uktam arthamukhenaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_2: śabdasyāpi punaruktatety abhiprāyeṇa / sarvanāmaparāmarśayogyasyeti nirdiṣṭāṃ yogyatāṃ vibhaktum āha - prādhānyam iti / dvividhaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_3: parāmarśayogyatvaṃ śābdam ārthaṃ ceti / tatra yasmin parāmṛśyasya svātantryeṇa kartṛtvādinā nirdeśena prādhānyaṃ tatra śābdam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_4: yatra punaḥ parāmṛśyasyānyaḥ kaś cit saṃbandhitvena nirdiśyate, tatrārtham / tatra hi saṃbandhinaṃ prati asyopayoga eva yogyatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_5: tathā caikam udāhṛtam / saṃbandhipratītimukheneti / atra saṃbandhī haraḥ tasya maulidvāreṇa śaśāṅkasaṃbandhitvāt / tatpratītimukhena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_6: cātra śaśāṅkaḥ pratīyate, na tu cārutā vapur ityādau cārutāder iva sākṣād eva śaśāṅkasya pratītiḥ / śaśāṅkasaṃbandhinām iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_7: atra saṃbandhinibandha iti kārikāyāṃ yaḥ saṃbandhī yuktaḥ, sa nirdiṣṭaḥ / tathā cātrāṃśavaḥ saṃbandhitvena nirdiṣṭāḥ / tatparāmarśayogyateti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_8: tacchabdena parāmṛśyaḥ śaśāṅko nirdiṣṭaḥ / sā hi guṇībhūtasyeti / haramanyapadārthaṃ prati niśāpatir guṇībhūtaḥ / tasyāpi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_9: niśā guṇībhūtā / sā ca bhuvaneti / atra na nagendratanayāyāḥ saṃbandhī nirdiṣṭaḥ / api tu sā cety anena svarūpam nirdiṣṭam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_10: vihasto na kva cic chaktaḥ / samāsagatasyeti parāmṛśyasyeti saṃbandhaḥ / tatra hi parāmṛśyasya samāse guṇībhāvāt saṃbandhinaś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_0: na sarvajanasaṃvedanīya iti / asyārthaḥ - yathāsmai rocate viśvaṃ tathedaṃ parivartate iti nyāyenātrātiprauḍhatayā granthakāro
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_1: nijāyattāṃ padārthavyavasthāṃ karttum ārabdhaḥ, yena tadaṃśunicitaḥ iti tat tamasām iti ca śaśāṅkasya niśāyāś ca tacchabdena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_2: parāmarśam aghaṭamānam api samarthayate, jakṣur bisaṃ ghṛtavikāsibisaprasūnā ity atra ca bisaprasūnaśabdasya saṃjñāpadasyāpi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_3: bisaśabdāśrayeṇa sūkṣmekṣikayā paunaruktyaṃ doṣam udbhāvayati / na caitat samarthanaṃ hṛdayahāri, yasmāc chaśāṅkamaulir iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_4: ca niśāpatimaulir iti ca saṃjñāśabdāv etau / saṃjñāśabdānāṃ ca vidyamānasyāpy arthānugamasya na prayojakatvaṃ rūḍheḥ prādhānyāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_5: tataś cātra na śaśāṅkārtho na niśārthaḥ kaś cit / kiṃ tūpāyamātreṇaitāv arthāv āśritya saṃjñiviśeṣa evātra vivakṣitaḥ / evaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_6: ca saṃjñyantargatayoḥ śaśāṅkaniśayos tacchabdaparāmarśena sahṛdayahṛdayāny āvarjayatīti haṭhasarmathanam etat / kiṃ ca śaśāṅkamaulir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_7: ity atra varaṃ śaśāṅkasya bhavatu sarvanāmnā parāmarśaḥ tasya vakrākṛtes tatra saṃnihitatvāt, niśāpatimaulir ity atra tu
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_8: niśāyāḥ parāmarśaḥ pāpāt pāpīyān niśāpater evoktakrameṇa tatra saṃnihitatvāt / niśāyā upalakṣaṇamātratvenopayoginyās tatra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_9: saṃbhavābhāvāt / yatra ca tasyā eva na saṃbhavas tatra kā vārtā tamasām / tad ayam andho maṇim avindat / tam anaṅgulir āvayad
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_10: iti nyāya āyāt / api ca yatra prasāritānugamena śabdena saṃjñinaḥ pratyāyanaṃ kriyate, paraṃ tatrānugamotkarṣād bhavati sarvanāmaparāmarśaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:151: tatprabhābhir iva pūritaṃ vapur bhāti yasya sitabhasmaguṇṭhitam //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:152_0: iti / atra hi pādavyāpinī saṃjñānvarthatvam evotkarṣayati / tenātra parāmarśo nāpratītikaraḥ / prakṛte tu tādṛśy api gatir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:152_1: nāsti / āstāṃ vā prakṛtam / atrāpi hi rohiṇīramaṇetyādau yadi sūkṣmekṣikā kriyate tadā saṃjñāprādhānyāt tadaṃśasya sarvanāmaparāmarśo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:152_2: nāduṣṭatām bhajate / prakṛte tu pāpāt pāpīyān parāmarśaḥ / kṛtaṃ cātra samarthanaṃ granthakṛtā / tad etad asya viśvam agaṇanīyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:153_0: granthakarttuḥ punar ayam āśayaḥ - iha tu dvividhāḥ saṃjñāśabdāḥ rūḍhā yogarūḍhayaś ca / tatra rūdḥānām arthānugamābhāvāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:153_1: tadanusaraṇaṃ na karttavyam / ye tu yogarūḍhayas teṣāṃ yadi yoga utkaṭatāṃ bhajate tadāśrayo vyavahāro na duṣyati / ata eva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:153_2: nimittabalena pravṛttasya śabdasya nimittāntarbhāve prayogaḥ saugatair niṣiddha eva / yad āhuḥ -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:155: śabdānām anurundhāno na bādhas tena varṇitaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_0: iti / evaṃ sthite yogāśrite vyavahāre yadi saṃjñāvayavabhūtārthasyāvyabhicārī kaś cit pratipipādayiṣitaḥ syāt tadā tadabhisaṃbandhāya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_1: tasyāvayavasya sarvanāmaparāmarśo na duṣṭaḥ / yad uktam - sarvanāmnānusaṃdhivṛtticchannasya iti / maulir ity atra śaśāṅkāvyabhicāriṇo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_2: raśmayaḥ saṃbandhitvena pratipāditāḥ / niśāpatimaulir ity atra niśāvyabhicārīṇi tamāṃsi / teṣāṃ cāvāstavatvam api na tathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_3: duṣṭam, utprekṣāgocaratvena pratipāditatvāt / kevalaṃ pūrvatra saṃjñisaṃbandhī, paratra tu saṃbandhisaṃbandhī parāmṛṣṭa iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_4: viśeṣaḥ / tad evaṃ yaugikānāṃ saṃjñāśabdānāṃ yoganimitto vyavahāraḥ kva cit kva cit suvyavasthita eva / yat tu kuryāṃ harasyāpi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_5: pinākapāṇer ity atra pinākapāṇipadasya saṃjñāśabdasya sato 'rthānugamo nivārayiṣyate yena saṃjñāvagamārthaṃ haraśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_6: tan nārthānugamābhāvapratipādanapareṇa, kiṃ tv anugamyamānasyārthasya saṃrambhāspadatvena vivakṣitatvaṃ pṛthak saṃjñāpadaprayogam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_7: antareṇa na nirvahati saṃjñārthasyārthānugamasya ca yugapat prādhānyābhāvād iti dvayaprayoga evaivaṃvidheṣu sthāneṣu śasyata
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_8: ity abhiprāyeṇa / prakṛte vastusvarūpamātrapratipādane saṃjñāśabdatve 'py arthānugamānusaraṇam avyāhatam iti / itarathety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_9: ubhayavidhayogyatābhāve parāmṛśyapratīter abhāvād ity arthaḥ / atra tv iti / jakṣur bisam ity atra / saṃbandhinaḥ prasūnasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_10: nibandhane upādāne / ārtha iti / kriyākārakabhāvasyākhyātapadavācyatvena śābdena krameṇa prastāve 'tra viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa samāsena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_11: pra to 'rthaḥ pratīter ārthatvam / taccānekaprakāram iti tacchabdena paunaruktyaṃ parāmṛṣṭam / saṃkṣepeṇa pañcaprakāraṃ paunaruktya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_12: nirdiśyate / aśvīyeti / atra keśāśvābhyāṃ yañchau iti samūhe 'rthe chapratyayaḥ / evaṃ chapratyayaḥ saṃhatiśabdaś ca bhisaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_13: prakṛtitvena nirdiṣṭau punar uktau / aśvair ity eva hi vācyam / biseti bisakisalayacchedapātheyā iti tvaguttarāsaṅgām iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_14: ca vācyam / bahuvrīhīti matvarthe bahuvrīhividhānam / karmadhārayamatvarthīyābhyām iti / karmadhārayamatvarthīyau samuccayenāvasthitau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_0: iti bahavo bhūmādayo 'rthā astyartham anugacchanto mattvarthīyatāviṣayatvenoktāḥ / te kim iti na bahuvrīhivācyatvenoktā ity
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_1: āha mator iti / matubgrahaṇaṃ matvarthīyānām upalakṣaṇam / bhūmādayo hy arthā na kevalebhyo matubādibhyaḥ pratīyante, kiṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_2: tu prakraṇādisahāyebhyas tebhya iti na matubādivicāreṇodāhriyante, nāntarīyakatayā teṣāṃ gatatvāt / jāmbaveti tadīyeti vanyeti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_3: ca taddhitapratyayasya paunaruktyam / jambūpallavānīti, tanmātaṅgeti, vanakariṇām iti ca ṣaṣṭhīsamāsenaiva taddhitakarmadhārayalakṣaṇavṛttidvayārthapratīteḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_4: vārtraghneti vṛtraghna indrasyāpatyam atra vivakṣitaṃ, nedam artha iti nātra taddhitasya paunaruktyam / samūhārthāyā iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_5: grāmajanabandhusahāyebhyaḥ iti samūhe talpratyayaḥ / atra janaśabdenaiva samūhārthapratītes talpratyayarūpāyāḥ prakṛter bahuvacanasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_6: pratyayasya ca paunaruktyam / pūrvavad iti dalatkandaleti lambāmbudam iti phullāmbujā iti ca bahuvrīhiṇaiva bhajaty arthādīnāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_7: pratīteḥ punar uktatvam / viśeṣyamātreti viśeṣyasyāviśiṣṭaviśeṣyarūpatayā viśiṣṭaviśeṣyarūpatayā vā pratītiḥ / tatra viśiṣṭaviśeṣyarūtayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_8: pratītau yatra viśeṣaṇamātrād eva viśeṣyasyaiva pratītiḥ, tatra viśeṣyaprayogo na duṣyati yathā tatra prasādād ity atra vakṣyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_9: kiṃ tūpāyamatreṇaitāva bhavaśabdasyeti śītakiraṇābharaṇa ity anenaiva pratītatvād bhavārthasya, yathā nidhānagarbhām iva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_10: sāgarāmbarām ity atra sāgarāmbarāśabdena medinyāḥ / camūrur mṛgaviśeṣaḥ / kuthaḥ varṇakambalaḥ / ekatarasyeti indravāhanaśabdaprayoge
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_11: kuthasāmarthyān nāgendrapratītir nāgendraśabdaprayoge ca śuklavarṇasya varṇitatvād indravāhanapratītir ity ekatarasyaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_12: prayogo nyāyyaḥ / yatra tad ityādinā viśiṣṭaviśeṣyarūpatayā viśeṣyapratipattim udāharati / tadviśeṣaḥ viśeṣyagato viśeṣaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_13: haraśabdasyeti pinākapāṇiśabdena haragato viśeṣaḥ pratipādyate yaḥ sarvotkarṣahetutvena vivakṣito na sajñimātram ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_14: viśeṣyopādānam antareṇāpīti / kusumāyudhaśabdo 'pi hi viśeṣaṇam api viśeṣyam avagamayaty avyabhicārāt / na tu tasya pṛthakprayogaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_15: atrāpīti pinākapāṇer ity atra liṅuttamapuruṣeṇaiveti asmady uttamaḥ ity atra hi sthāniny apīty anuvartanād aprayukte 'py
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_16: asmacchabde tadarthasaṃbhave uttamapuruṣo bhavaty eva / tadanupādānaṃ viśeṣyānupādānam / anyeṣām iti / bahuvacanād īdṛkṣu
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_17: sthāneṣv ekenaivevaśabdena gatārthatvād anyeṣāṃ prayogo viphala ity abhiprāyaḥ / tṛtīyasyāpīti vākyārthaupamyavivakṣāyām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_18: eka evevaśabdaḥ prayoktavyaḥ / padārthaupamyavivakṣaṇe tu yāvanto viśeṣyabhūtāḥ padārthās tāvanta ivaśabdāḥ prayoktavyāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_19: na tv ardhajaratīyaṃ kāryam ity arthaḥ / etac cābhyupagamavādenoktam / na tu saṃbhavantyāṃ vākyārthopamāyāṃ padārthopamāḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_20: kāryā ity asya pakṣaḥ / tathā ca dine dine ityādinā dūṣayiṣyati / dine dine iti / atra cāndramasyā lekhāyā pārvatyupamānaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_21: viśeṣāṇāṃ tu kalāntarāṇi / viśeṣāṇāṃ ca lāvaṇyamayān iti viśeṣaṇam / tatsthanīyaṃ kalāntarāṇāṃ jyotsnāntarāṇīti / jyotsnāntare
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_22: yeṣām iti hi vyākhyā / dine dine ityādi pārvatīndulekhayoḥ sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ / na tu kalāntarāṇi kartṝṇi jyotsnāntarāṇi puṣṇatīti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_23: sādhvī vyākhyā vacanabhedādidoṣaprasaṅgāt / atra cāndramasīva lekhā kalāntarāṇi puṣṇātīty ekenaivevaśabdena gatārthatve dvitīyasyevaśabdasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_24: paunaruktyam / yaṃ sametyeti / atra yam ity asya caṇḍamāruta upamānaṃ, cedipadasya ca pradīpaḥ / tulyārthe vatiḥ / vilocanapraśamanād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_25: eva śambhuvibhramatyāgaḥ / atra ca datte 'pi pāṭhe karmabhūtayor upameyopamānayor lalāṭalekhayetyādivijātīyapadagarbhitatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_26: vikṛtapadaprayogo vairasyaṃ ca dupariharam eva / tena caṇḍamārutanavapradīpavad iti pāṭhaḥ śreyān / evaṃ hi miśabdasthāne
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_27: naśabdamātrakaraṇena stokamātravyatyāsena saukaryeṇa doṣaparihārapratītiḥ saundaryaṃ ca / malayajārdram iveti himāṃśukhaṇḍasyotprekṣyatvenopanibaddham
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_28: ākāṅkṣāsaṃnidhisāmarthyāl lalāṭataṭasya viśeṣaṇaṃ paryavasyatīti kaver abhiprāyaḥ / vastutas tv ivaśabdaprayogam antareṇāpīṣṭasiddher
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_29: ivaśabdaḥ punar uktaḥ / na candrakhaṇḍasya malayajārdratvotprekṣaṇe prayojanaṃ kiṃ cit / yatra caitad dhi viśeṣaṇam upayujyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_30: tatrevaśabdaprayogo vyarthaḥ / tadabhinnārtheneti samāse ivārthagarbhīkārāt / viparyayeṇeti lalāṭataṭanikaṭe prayogārhatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_31: varam iti ivaśabdasya bhinnakramatvāparihārād anavatṛptiḥ / kevalaṃ hārīty asya samāsākaraṇād ivārthāpratīter ivaśabdo na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_32: punar ukta iti paunaruktyaparihāraḥ kṛtaḥ / aho aparyanteti od iti pragṛhyasaṃjñā / upamārūpaketyādinā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_0: iti / vakroktijīvitakṛtas tu tam alaṅkārapuṣṭhapātinam alaṅkāraṃ dūṣayati / nirmokam uktim iveti atropamārūpakatvaṃ paraprasiddhyoktam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_1: na tv idam upamārūpakam / utprekṣārūpakaṃ tu syāt, nirmokam uktas saṃbhāvyamānatvena pratīteḥ / tathā hi nirmokānuguṇyāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_2: tāvat gaganasyorageṇa rūpaṇam / nirvyūḍhe ca rūpake nirmokam uktir na tāṭasthyena pratīyate, kiṃ tu gaganoragasaṃbandhitvena /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_3: gaganoragasaṃbandhitvena ca pratītau na sādṛśyam api tv adhyavasāyaḥ / tasya ca pravṛttamānatvam ity utprekṣaiva jyāyāsī
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_4: pratītau / ataś ceyaṃdaṃmuktipadaṃ kṛtam / anyathā śuddhasādṛśyapratipādane dharmy eva viśiṣṭo nirmoka upamānatvena nirdeśyaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_5: syāt / bhinnaliṅgayor upamāyā duṣṭatvān na nirdiṣṭa iti cen na / sādhāraṇadharmasyānirdeśe nirdiṣṭasyāpi vā dvairūpyābhāve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_6: bhinnaliṅgasaṅkhyayor api strīva gacchati ṣaṇḍo 'yam ityādau hantāvahanti doṣā iva nṛpatīnāṃ guṇa iha sahaivadurvinayam ityādau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_7: copamānopameyabhāvasyeṣṭatvāt / tasmād upamāyāṃ nirmoka iveti syāt / utprekṣāyāṃ kriyāmātrotprekṣaṇam upapadyata ity utprekṣārūpakam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_8: etat paramārthataḥ / etad asmābhir harṣacaritavārttike vistṛtya pratipāditaṃ tata evāvaseyam / evaṃ paraśur ivetyādau vācyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_9: tamoraṇyavahner ivārcir iti / atra tamaso 'raṇyena rūpeṇa vahnir arcissaṃbandhitayā vivakṣitaḥ samāse niveśanīyaḥ, yato na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_10: kaś cid atra nirdiṣṭaḥ yo vahninā rūpyeta / tasmāt tamoraṇyasya vahnyarcir iti vaktavyam ity atra vācyāvacanaṃ doṣaḥ / ālānam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_11: iti saty eva sādṛśye āropyāropakabhāvasya nidarśanam / cumbatīveti / atroprekṣārthe prayuktasyevaśabdasya lakṣaṇāsamarthitenārthena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:164_0: atra copamārūpakābhimate evaṃvidhe ca pradeśe granthakāro hevākitayaiva dūṣaṇam adāt / tathā śabdārthayor vicchittir alaṅkāraḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:164_1: vicchittiś ca kavipratibhollāsarūpatvāt kavipratibhollāsasya cānantyād anantatvaṃ bhajamānā na paricchettuṃ śakyate / ata
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:166: nibaddhā sā kṣayaṃ naiti prakṛtir jagatām iva //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169_0: iti / evaṃ ca yadi vicchttyantarāpekṣayā tasya vicchittyantarasya paunaruktyaṃ tadopamāyā rūpakādyapekṣayā paunaruktyaṃ syāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169_1: upamāpekṣayā hi rūpakam atiśayoktir vā balīyasī / na caivaṃ prayujyate, vivakṣāyā nānātvāt / tathā hi kva cit sādṛśyamātraṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169_2: vivakṣitam / tatrāpi kva cid abhedaḥ / tasminn api kvacid āropaḥ / kvacid adhyavasāyaḥ / adhyavasāye 'pi kva cit sādhyatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169_3: kva cit siddhatvam ityādikrameṇānantaprakāraṃ vicchittivaicitryam / tatrāpi saṃyojanakrameṇa navaṃ vicchittivaicitryam anubhūyamānam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169_4: āśritaṃ ca mahākavibhiḥ kathaṃ saṃkṣeparucitvenāpahnūyate / na hīdaṃ vākyaṃ lakṣaṇaśāstraṃ, yena mātrālāghavaṃ cintyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169_5: tatrāpi vā na niyamena lāghavam āśritaṃ mahadbhiḥ / tathā hi vāgrahaṇasya sthāne 'nyatarasyāṃ grahaṇam api kṛtam / vicchittivaicitryaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169_6: tair apy āśritam eva / tad uktaṃ vicitrā hi sūtrasya kṛtiḥ pāṇineḥ iti / evaṃ cātra kṛte 'pi rūpake utprekṣādinibandhaḥ kam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169_7: api guṇam utkarṣayati na doṣam iti sahṛdayair nipuṇaṃ nirūpaṇīyam / na tu hevākasya paścāl laganīyam ity āstāṃ tāvat / prakṛtam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:170_0: murmuraḥ aṅgāraḥ / āmravaṇasyeti pranirantar ṇatvam / pathikavrajān parita iti / paritaśśabdayoge abhitaḥ paritaḥ samayānikaṣā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:170_1: iti dvitīyā / atra dadhur ivetīvaśabdaḥ punar ukta eva, vastvantarabhūtānāṃ rajaḥkaṇānāṃ vastvantarabhūtamurmuracūrṇatvadhāraṇena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:171: tat pātu vaḥ śrīpatinābhipadmaṃ svādhyāyaśālā kamalāsanasya /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:172: dīrghair ninādair dadhate 'nukāraṃ sāmadhvanīnām iva yatra bhṛṅgāḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_0: ityādāv anukāraśabdaprayoge ivādiśabdaprayogasya paunaruktyam avaseyam / prativastvalaṅkārād iti pūrṇaḥ śaśāṅkābhyudayam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_1: ākāṅkṣati mahārṇavaḥ iti prativastūpamayā sādṛśyapratītau dṛṣṭāntaśabdoktir duṣṭā / na ca dṛṣṭāntālaṅkāratvaṃ pratipādayituṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_2: dṛṣṭāntaśabdaḥ, dṛṣṭāntaśabdād dṛṣṭāntālaṅkāratvāpratīteḥ / na hi ṣaṣṭhyādiparihāreṇa saṃbandhiśabdāt saṃbandhapratītiḥ rasaśabdād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_3: vā rasapratītiḥ / adūraviprakarṣeṇa tv abhidhānaṃ vastusaṃsparśi bhavatīti / nanu svakaṇṭhenābhidhānam apahāya kim iti sādṛśyapratītir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_4: āśrīyata ity āha vācyo hy artha iti / pūrvavad iti / pūrvaṃ yathā ālānam ity ādau rūpakamukhenopamānopameyabhāvaḥ kathitas
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_5: tadvad iha dīpakamukhenety arthaḥ / atra ca dvayoḥ prabhādhenvoḥ prākaraṇikatvāt tulyayogitām adyatanā manyante / dvayor
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_6: api prākaraṇikatve mahāprakaraṇāpekṣayā dhenoḥ prakṛṣṭaṃ prākaraṇikatvaṃ prabhāyās tv aprakrṣṭam ity etadapekṣayā cirantanair
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_7: dīpakam etat sthāpitam / tadapekṣayātrānena tadvācoyuktiḥ kṛtā / evam alaṅkārāntareṣv api samāsoktyapastutapraśaṃsādiṣu /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:174: draviṇam āpadi bhūṣaṇam utsave śaraṇam ātmabhaye niśi dīpikāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:175: bahuvidhārthyupakārabharakṣamo bhavati ko 'pi bhavān iva san maṇiḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_0: ity atrāprastutapraśaṃsayā bhavadarthasya sadṛśatvena pratīteḥ punar vacanaṃ na karttavyam iti vakṣyate / asmābhiś caitat
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_1: prapañco bṛhatyāṃ kariṣyate / itinaiveti itiśabdo hetvarthah prayujyamānaḥ svabhāvataḥ pūrvavākyārthasyocyamānatvaṃ bodhyamānatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_2: vā garbhīkṛtya pravartate / varam iti uktadoṣadvayanivāraṇamātram etat / na tu sarvathā niravadyam idam, yataśśabdātaśśabdayor
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_3: vaiyarthyāt / anibandhanasyeti na hi pūraṇīyapūrakatvena duṣṭatvam / aviśeṣaṇa iti viśeṣaṇadānārtham avyabhicāriṇo 'pi prayogaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_4: śasyata ity arthaḥ tathā cāha vāmanaḥ - viśeṣaṇasya ca iti / vyalokyateti vilokanakriyaiva lokitāraṃ lokam ākṣipatīti lokaśabdasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_5: paunaruktyam / dvaya'rpāti prasthānavaśān nītivaśāc cāśrīyante / gām iti gośabdasya vākparyāyasya vacanakriyāyām avyabhicārāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_6: prayogo na kāryaḥ / dṛṣṭa iti darśanakriyāyā dṛg eva karaṇatvenākṣipteti dṛkśabdaḥ punar uktaḥ / kārakāntareṣv apīti yathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_7: sthāne tiṣṭhati ity atrādhikaraṇasya paunaruktyam / vivikte sthāne tiṣṭhatīti tu viśeṣaṇārthaṃ prayogo na duṣṭaḥ / ekaiveti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_8: ekaivopamādiḥ / śābdatvaṃ śrautatvaṃ yathevādiśabdaprayogāt / ārthatvaṃ sadṛśādiśabdaprayogāt / atisphuṭām iti sthūladṛṣṭyaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_9: dṛśyām ity arthaḥ / umāvṛṣāṅkāv iti / atra śarajanmanā yathetyādinā pratīto 'py upamānopameyabhāvas tatsadṛśenetyādinā punar
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_10: uktaḥ / kaves tu nandananimittaḥ pūrva upamānopameyabhāvaḥ / pratīyamānaprabhāvādinimittas tv aparaḥ / tathā cāyaṃ dilīpa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_11: iti rājendur induḥ kṣīranidhāv iva ity evaṃvidham upamānopameyabhāvam ātanoti / granthakāras tu viśiṣṭopamānanirdeśān nāntarīyakatayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_12: prabhāvādipratītir bhavatīti na dvirupādānaṃ kāryam iti manyate / yasyeti yasya pūrvatāder yadrūpatāyāḥ priyatamādirūpatvasyābhivyaktiḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_13: sāmarthyāl liṅgaviśeṣaśliṣṭapadopanibandhanarūpād bhavati, tasya parvatādeḥ tadarthaṃ priyatamādirūpatvapratītyartham upamā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_14: rūpakaṃ vā yan nibadhyate, tat punar uktam ity arthaḥ / uravo mahāntaḥ payodharā meghāḥ urū ca payodharau stanau ca / samayāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_15: saṅgatety arthaḥ / ārdranakhakṣatam iveti bhinnakrama ivaśabdaḥ / yāpito gamitaḥ nirvāhita ity arthaḥ / upamānād eveti ākārasādṛśyena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_16: palāśaṃ prati dīyamānād ārdranakhakṣatam ity asmāt / tadviśeṣaṇopādānam iti ramaṇadattam ity ārdranakhakṣataviśeṣaṇopādānaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_17: madayāpitalajjayeti pramadāviśeṣaṇopādānaṃ cety arthaḥ / yata iti nakhakṣatam ivety upamopakṛtāt surabhivanamālādīnāṃ puṃstvastrītvanirdeśād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_18: ity arthaḥ / strīpuṃsatvānumitir iti prathamavimarśoktaprakāreṇa vyakter anumitirūpatvenopapāditatvāt / aindraṃ dhanur iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_19: atyanteti ābhogīti codāharaṇatrayaṃ vaidharmyakrameṇoktam / upapannakramasyāsya sadbhāvāt / nāyakatvapratināyakatve iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_20: anumīyate iti śeṣaḥ / evam aṅganeva maṇistambhāv iti anumīyata iti śeṣaḥ / bhogī vāsukeḥ sa eva netram ākarṣaṇarajjus tasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_21: ā samantād yat parivartanarūpo viśeṣeṇa bhramo bhramaṇaṃ, tena mandarasya mūrttiḥ nitambe madhyabhāge valanaṃ parivarttanaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_22: tenākulā jātā / tathā ābhogi vistāravat yan netraṃ nayanaṃ tasya parivartanaṃ kaṭākṣīkaraṇaṃ sa eva vibhramo vilāsaḥ / mūrttyā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_23: samāropitanāyikāvyavahārayā / utkalikās taraṅgā ruhiruhikāś ca hṛdayaṃ madhyadeśāś cittaṃ ca / ārohārtha iti āroḍhum iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_24: pūrvaślokabhāgagataḥ / hṛdayārthaś ceti / hṛdayam ambunidher ity atra sthitiḥ / tayor iti āroho jīvavyāpāraviśeṣaḥ / hṛdayaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_25: jīvakāyaikadeśaviśeṣaḥ / alaṅkārāntaratvam iti sādṛśyāl lakṣaṇā vakroktir ityādiprakāreṇa / lākṣaṇikahṛdayādiśabdaprayoge
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_26: svaśabdaṃ vināpy arthāntaraṃ pratīyata ity āha yadartheti / yatropameye 'mbunidhiprabhṛtau / yadarthaikāśrayo nāyakādirūpopamānaviṣayo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_27: dharmo hṛdayādir āropito lakṣaṇayā bhavet, tayor nāyakāder upamānasyāmbunidhyādeś copameyasyopamānopameyabhāvaḥ śābdo neṣyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_28: gamyamānas tv iṣṭa evety arthaḥ / atraiva aparāgetyādinā śābdatve doṣodāharaṇam āha / mūlāny amātyādiprakṛtivargaḥ vṛkṣāvabandhanāni
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_29: ca unmūlayituṃ sukara iti yojanā / tad dhīti upamānopameyatvam / rūpakaṃ yatheti / tasyopamā rūpakaṃ vā ity anusaṃdhatte /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_30: anurāgo lauhityam api / apiśabdaḥ sukhādipadanikaṭe yojanīyaḥ / vasuśabdas tejodhanayoḥ / atra niṣkāsanam utkaṭatvena gaṇikādharmo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_31: rūpakasya sādhakaḥ pramāṇam / kāryataś ceti kāryam atra niṣkāsanam / tadviśeṣasya strītvaviśeṣasya gaṇikārūpasyeti / ubhayārtheti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_32: dvyarthapadaprayogaḥ pāṇḍupayodhareṇa ityādau / liṅgaviśeṣaḥ śarad raveḥ ityādau / guṇavṛtti padam āroḍhuṃ hṛdayam ityādau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_33: upamānaviśeṣo yathā ārdranakhakṣatābham ityādau / ākrośo gālidānam / paryāyoktīti yena rāhustrīstanayoḥ kārkaśyalakṣmīr vṛthā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_34: kṛtety anena bhaṅgyantareṇa rāhoḥ śiraśchedaḥ prakāśita iti tatsādhanam asādhāraṇaṃ cakraṃ pratīyata evety arthaḥ / padādīti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_35: padādigatānām akṣarāṇām anuprāso gumphabhaṅgī darśayan kavīnām atyantavallabha ity arthaḥ / kalabhāṣiṇīti / atra kamalekṣaṇe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_36: ity arthānuguṇaḥ pāṭhaḥ / anyathānuprāsahevākitaiva syāt / śatrur eva śātrava iti prajñāditvāt svārthe 'ṇ / tadrūpaṇam eveti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_37: upamāpekṣayā rūpakasya gamyamānaupamyatvāt prayogārhatve 'pi sāmarthyāvagatarūpatvād yatrābhidhānaṃ punar uktaṃ tatropamāyāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_38: paunaruktye kā śaṅkā iti / ivaśabdasyeti mūrcchita iva mūrcchayatīty arthapratīteḥ siddhatvāt / viṣādisaṃparkād dhi mohaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_39: prāptaḥ parān api mohayatīti prasiddham / ayaṃ mandadyutir iti nidarśanāyāṃ mamevety arthāt pratītaṃ na punar upāttam / mumūrccheti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_40: prasasārety arthaḥ / bādhakasadbhāvābhāva iti / anena yatraikasyaiva viśeṣaṇasyopamānopameyasaṃbandhabādhakam asti tatra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_0: ityādau prativastūpamāyām ity āha / atra hīvādiśabdābhāve sati vākyabhedaḥ / prākaraṇikatvopamānopameyabhāvapratītau sādharaṇadharmasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_1: pṛthakprayogam antareṇa vākyārthasaṅgatir na bhavatīti pṛthak prayogo na duṣṭaḥ / tadvacanam iti sahajapadena svābhāvikatvavacanam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_2: tulyavibhaktīnām arthāt upamānopameyānām / eṣā nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī / etanmadhye ekasyety arthaḥ / paryāyair iti / svābhāvikapadādiṣu
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_3: kṛteṣu sahajapadādibhiḥ / samāsāntarapadāśrayaṇeneti umā ca mā ca umāme / tayoḥ dhavāv ityādi dvandvapūrvakatatpuruṣāśrayeṇety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_4: arthaḥ / chāyānihatapadayor iti prathamaṃ chāyāśabdaḥ dvitīyaś nihataśabdaḥ kartavyaḥ syād iti dārṣṭāntikakrameṇaiva dṛṣṭāntāv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_5: uktau / astv iti chāyānihataśabdayoḥ prayogaḥ / ubhayor apīti / dvandvapūrvakasya bahuvrīher bahuvrīhipūrvakasya vā dvandvasyety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_6: arthaḥ / etac ca dṛṣṭāntagatatvenoktam api dārṣṭāntikagatatvenāpi paryavasānaṃ neyam / dārṣṭāntike hītthaṃ yojanā / tatpuruṣapūrvasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_7: dvandvasya dvandvapūrvasya vā tatpuruṣasya lakṣaṇānugamaḥ saṃbhavatīti / tadarthatvād ity uktaṃ vidheyāvimarśavicāre / yāvadbhir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_8: iti padair ity arthāt / tatpuruṣalakṣaṇāśrayeṇeti prakṛte dvandvalakṣaṇapūrvakatvaṃ jñeyam / evaṃ na dvandvalakṣaṇam ity
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_9: atra tatpuruṣalakṣaṇapūrvakatvaṃ boddhavyam / tasyeti dvandvasya / atajjātīya iti yatra tatpuruṣaśaṅkā nāstīti pārvatīparameśvarāv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_10: ity atrāpi parameśvarapade karmadhārayāśrayaṇadarśanena tatpuruṣapūrvakatvaṃ yojanīyam / avāntaracintayeti paunaruktyaprastāve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_11: samāsacintayety arthaḥ / atra mādhavaśabdasya yaugikatve 'pi samṃjñātvena nrūḍher umāmādhavāv iti prayoge umāyā mādhavasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_12: ca spṛṣṭatvena pratītir na tu dvandvapūrvakatatpuruṣārthasyeti dvandvalakṣaṇaṃ nātīva hṛdayaṅgamam ity āhuḥ / rekhā hīti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_13: rekhā maryādā avadhiḥ sīmeti paryāyāḥ / tatra heyapakṣapratikṣepeṇa prayogo yathā saṃsāreti / atra saṃsārasaṃbhavasya nirākaraṇam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_14: iti heyasya pratikṣepaḥ / upādeyaparigraho yathā tvaṣṭur iti / atra saṃpadaḥ prasaro vistāra ity upādeyasya parigrahaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_15: indūdayasyeva saṃnibhā yasyeti atra saṃnibhāśabdaḥ prabhāparyāyo vyākhyātaḥ / yathā tu dāṇḍo granthas tathā saṃnibhaśabdaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_0: iti / tadanusāreṇendūdayena sadṛśa indūdayasaṃnibha iti vyākhyeyam / taduktyaiveti avahitatvoktyety arthaḥ / mūḍhacetana
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_1: iti mūḍhadhiya iti ca mohanāmno mūḍhatvasya buddhidharmatvāt cetanadhīśabdayoḥ paunaruktyam / tatsaṃbandhāt tadavagatir iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_2: cetanasaṃbandhāc caitanyāvagatir ity arthaḥ / kṛpāmṛdur iti / kṛpā cetanadharma iti caitanyavācipadaṃ na kṛtam / evaṃ mūḍhāḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_3: mūḍhaḥ ity atrāpi vācyam / uditavapuṣīti paunaruktyam evānusaṃdhatte / manaḥkartṛkatvaṃ pramodaḥ kriyākaraṇaśabdayor iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_4: atra gauḥ śābaleya itivac chokakriyāśabdayoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvena prayogaḥ / granthakṛtas tu viśeṣasyaivopayogāt sāmānyāvyabhicārāc
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_5: ca kriyāśabdasya vaiyarthyam karaṇaśabdasya kriyāvācitvān niṣphalatvam iti śokaśabda eva karttavya ity abhiprāyaḥ / anubhavaviśeṣātmatvopagama
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_6: iti saugataprakriyayaitad uktam / vaiśeṣikās tu jaḍam evātmaguṇam ekārthasamavāyinā jñānena grāhyaṃ sukham āhuḥ / tatprakriyāyāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_7: kartavyam evānubhavagrahaṇam / ekasyeti sāgarasya / itarasya ceti uttārārthasya / tadrūpatāvagater ity ubhayatra vācyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_8: madirādraveti / atra samābhātīty ekaṃ padaṃ gaṇitam upasargāṇāṃ dyotyapāratantryeṇa pṛthakpadārhatvābhāvāt / ekādiprayoge
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_9: satīti ekasya prayogābhyupagame 'nyeṣām eva tattvam / tatrāpy ekatvam aniyatam / evaṃ dvayos trayāṇām ityādiyojanā kāryā,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_10: tatrāpy aniyatatvena prakārabahutvāt / avivekaprayuktam iti / yady apy avimṛśyakāritvasyaivāpatkaraṇatvaṃ, tathāpy avivekasyāvimṛśyakāritvaprayojakatvāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_11: tasya kāraṇatve 'py avimṛśyakāritvam eva kāraṇam uktaṃ bhavati / na hīti yasmin sati vahnau dhūma ityādike pratibandhakālabhāviny
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_12: anvaye sati viśeṣaṇasya yasya asati vahnau na dhūma ityādivyatirekasya gatiḥ pratītiḥ, tasyānvayasya sa eva vyatireko hetur
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_13: yuktaḥ vayavasthitasya hetuhetumadbhāvasya vaiparītyaprasaṅgāt / anvayapratītihetuko hi vyatirekapratītyupakramo na tu viparyayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_14: viśeṣaṇāc ceti guṇalubdhā iti sādhāraṇatvād ity arthaḥ / sāmarthyeti / dvividhaṃ paunaruktyam arthagataṃ śabdagataṃ ceti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_15: tatrārthasya sāmarthyasiddhatve 'rthagataṃ gauṇam āmukhe paunaruktyānavabhāsāt / śabdagatam āsukhāvabhāsamānatvād mukhyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_16: prakṛtipratyayārthasyeti prakṛtyarthaḥ pratyayārthaḥ prakṛtipratyayasamudāyārtha iti vyastasamastatvena yojyam / evaṃ prakṛteḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_17: pratyayasya cety atrāpi vācyam / anyathā prāṅnirdiṣṭasya pañcavidhasya paunaruktyasyāsaṅgrahaḥ syāt / vihitasyeti / vastuvṛttyā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_18: sthitasya bahuvrīher yā karmadhārayaśaṅkā tayā matvarthīyādiḥ śabdaḥ kṛto bisakisalayacchedapātheyavanta ityādau / tasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_19: sphuṭaṃ paunaruktyaṃ vṛttidvayasya gauravāt / yasminn iti jāmbavapallavādaunītyādau yasmin pallavaśabda ity arthaḥ / arthaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_20: yatra + tyalakṣaṇo yattaddhitotpattiḥ yasmād aṇpratyayākhyāt taddhitād utpattiḥ pratītiviṣayatvāpattir yasyārthasya / tadantas
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_21: taddhitapratyayānto jāmbavaśabdādiḥ / tenaiva pallavaśabdena na samasanīyaḥ, jambūpallavānīti samāsena gatatvāt taddhitavaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_22: viśeṣaṇavaśād iti / pinākapāṇyādiviśeṣaṇamāhātmyāt / viśiṣṭam utkarṣāpakarṣavantaṃ saṃjñinaṃ harādikaṃ yatrecchet na tatra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_23: paunaruktyam / anyathā tu paunaruktyam / yathā pāyāt sa śītakiraṇābharaṇo bhavo vaḥ ityādau / sakṛd eveti sāmyābhidhāyī ivaśabdādiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_24: niryāya vidyetyādau / yadvad iti dṛṣṭāntamukhena janair ajātaskhalanair ityādi saṅgṛhītam / arthasyeti rāhustrīratanayor
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_25: ityādau / yadvaśād iti tajjigīrṣur ivetyādau / athavā yatra kārakaviśeṣavaśāt kriyāyāḥ pratītiḥ kriyāviśeṣavaśād vā kārakasya,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_26: tatra kriyākārakayoḥ prayogo na kārya ity ayam arthaḥ / yathā mā bhavantam ityādau / yo yaddharmeti aparadiggaṇiketyādau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_27: yo diglakṣaṇo 'rtho yaddharmasya gaṇikādharmasya niṣkāsanāder upacāreṇopalakṣitaḥ / tathā ambunidher mamanthe ityādau yasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_28: kāmukasya saṃbandhaṃ yad hṛdayādi tetyanānvito 'mbudhilakṣaṇo yaś cārthaḥ, tasya tadrūpaṇād gaṇikākāmukarūpaṇāt na śābdī /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_29: neṣyate / ārthī punar iṣyata eva / prayuktāntargatair eveti madirādravetyādau / kartari iti pradhānabhūte rājādau kartari /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_30: tatkriyāyāṃ ca khaḍgena cchadakriyāyāṃ rūḍhāyāṃ sādhakatamasya khaḍgasya yāni bahūni tadapekṣayāṅgāni dhārāvinipātādīni teṣāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_31: vāg vacanaṃ neṣyate yathā karakalitetyādau / etad uktaṃ bhavati / rājādau karttari cchedādikriyāyāṃ yat sādhakatamaṃ khaḍgādyaṅgaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_32: tasyāpy aṅgānāṃ dhārāvinipātādīnāṃ vacanaṃ neṣyate tenaivāṅgena pradhānabhūtenāvāntarāṅgānām apy ākṣepād / doṣadvayaṃ prayukteti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_33: karttari iti ca pratipāditam / te iti samāsāḥ / vṛttāv iti / samāse vākye vā asādhāraṇaṃ yatra viśeṣaṇaṃ tatra viśeṣyaṃ na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_34: vācyaṃ yathā duḥkhānubhavetyādau / yo yadātmeti bāṣpāder jalādirūpatvāvyabhicārāt prayojanābhāve jalādipadaprayogā na kārya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_35: ity arthaḥ / yathā nayane bāṣpavāriṇetyādau / yo yasyeti yo niṣyandanādiḥ yasya candrakāntāder dharmiṇo 'vyabhicārī dharmaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_36: tayoḥ samāso na praśasyate, yathā dviṣadvadhūlocanetyādau / anyathā iti / sādharmyārtha ity arthaḥ / kriyeti kriyāyāḥ śokādilakṣaṇāyāḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_37: pratītiḥ karaṇapratītiṃ na vyabhicarati karaṇam eva yataḥ kriyā / tadapratītau karaṇāpratītau saiva śokādilakṣaṇā kriyā na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_38: niścitā syād ekatvāt / tyāgakriyety atraitad eva kriyāśabdapravṛttinimittam / tat tasmāt / tayadvaśāt śokādiśabdaprayogavaśād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_39: yasya karaṇasya vyaktiḥ prakāśas taduktau śākādiśabdaprayoge tat karaṇādivat padaṃ na prayuñjītety arthaḥ, yathā śokakriyākaraṇasyetyādau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_40: prayukte ceti prakṛtyādipaunaruktyānāṃ caturṇām upasaṃhāraḥ / anyonyeti vākyapaunaruktyasaṃgrahaḥ / ubhayor uktir ekasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_41: ubhayamadhyāt kasya cit / paunaruktyaṃ nātikrāmati / yathā sahasā vidadhītetyādau //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:182_0: evaṃ paunaruktyaṃ saprapañcaṃ vicārya vācyāvacanaṃ prapañcayitum āha - vācyasyāvacanaṃ yatheti / asamāsena nirdeśo vakṣyamāṇam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:182_1: etatsamānanyāyam avācyasya vacanam api kaṭākṣayitum / idamā parāmarśa iti abādhitapratyakṣanimittatvād bhrāntinivṛtteḥ pratyakṣasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:182_2: ca viṣayamukhena parāmarśārhatvāt / tasya yat svaśabdena vacanam iti pūrvaṃ saty eva sarvanāmni punaḥ svaśabdena pratipādanaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_0: iti punaruktam uktam / idānīṃ tu sarvanāmasthanīyatvena svaśabdena vacanaṃ vācyāvacanam ucyate / dharmidharmeti dharmī haralakṣaṇo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_1: 'rthaḥ / dharmaḥ kapālasaṃbandhena garhitatvam / ubhayaṃ dharmidharmātmakam / viśeṣapratipattaya iti garhitatvam atra viśeṣaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_2: tasyeti garhitatvasya / evaṃ tasya vivakṣitety atra jñeyam / vivakṣito 'rthaḥ śocyatālakṣaṇaḥ / ārtha iti viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_3: bhāvāt / vāmalocanātvam iti / na cātra vāmalocaneti viśeṣyapadam / yato 'pi yattacchabdadvayotthāpitavākyārthadvayasāmarthyān
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_4: nāyikālakṣaṇasya viśeṣyasya pratītiḥ / viśeṣaṇam evātra vāmalocanāpadam / tṛtīya iti ubhayavṛttitvākhyaḥ / na cāsāv iti āvṛttiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_5: na caiṣām iti tenaiva tatparyāyeṇa sarvanāmnā cety eṣāṃ prakārāṇām / alpadoṣatvād iti / tasyeti vyavahitasaṃbandhāt kiṃ cid
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_6: utkṛṣṭatvam / tasya samāgamaprārthanayeti vācyam / arthabhedād iti / ayam arthaḥ ekasyāsakṛdvṛttā sarvā vāvṛttiḥ, yathā daridrāṇāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_7: bhojane kāṃsyapātryāḥ / tad uktam - āvṛttir asakṛdvṛttiḥ iti / na cārthabhede śabdasyaikatvaṃ nyāyyam arthabhedasya pradhānabhūtasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_8: guṇabhūtaṃ śabdaṃ prati bhedakatvam tvāt / tasmād atra dvayoḥ śabdayor vastuvṛttena yat sādṛśyaṃ yaś ca sādṛśyahetukaḥ pratipattṛṛṇām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_9: ekatābhramaḥ, tannibandhano 'yaṃ mukhya evāvṛttivyavahāra iti / ataś ceti / yata āvṛttir na yujyate, tata ity arthaḥ / dharmidharmobhayātmakam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_10: iti / ubhayamaye vastuni pratipatsita ity arthaḥ / yatrānyasyetyādinā / vācyāvacanodāharaṇaprasaṅgena śleṣaṃ guṇadoṣavattayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_11: vitataṃ vicārayati / alakālīti / alakāny evāḷikulam alakasadṛśaṃ cālikulam / chado 'dharaḥ patrāṇi ca / āmodaḥ praharṣaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_12: saurabhaṃ ca / karṇikā karṇābharaṇaṃ bījakośaś ca / na śleṣasyeti / nanu śleṣaprastāve kaḥ prasaṅgo 'bjasyopamānacarcāyām /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_13: naitat / alaṅkārāntaraviviktaviṣayābhāvena sarvālaṅkārāpavādatvāc śleṣasyopamāpratibhotpattihetuḥ śleṣa evātra nyāyyo nopamety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_14: abhiprāyaḥ / ata eva śleṣe tu tasya vācyatayety uktam / nibandha iti nibadhnantīti nirdiṣṭaḥ / tatsāmyaṃ rajjvādisāmyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_15: na śleṣasyeti upamāśleṣasyety arthaḥ / tena rajjvādipratipādakaṃ guṇā iveti na vācyam / nanu viśeṣaṇasāmyanibandhanā samāsoktir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_16: na ca nibadhnantīti viśeṣaṇam ity āha na hi viśeṣaṇasāmyam eveti / etac cāsmābhir harṣacaritavārtike nirṇītam iti tata evāvadhāryam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_17: pṛthak tam upādāyeti tacchabdena śaśī parāmṛṣṭaḥ / sa hy ārtha eveti upamānopameyabhāvaḥ / śleṣaviṣaye iti / atra tisraḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_18: kakṣyāḥ / rājaśabdasyobhayārthatvāc śleṣaḥ / tadanāśrayaṇenendunā rūpaṇaṃ tatpṛṣṭhe cendur ivety upamā / nanu rājendur ity
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_19: atra tūpamārūpakayor ekaparigrahe sādhakabādhakābhāvāt saṅkaro nyāyyaḥ, na niyamena rūpakam / tat katham uktaṃ rūpakam āsūtritam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_20: iti / ucyate / prakramyamāṇopamābhiprāyāt paunaruktyabhayena rūpakam āśritam / upamāyā abhāve tu saṅkara evātra yuktaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_21: yad vopamāpekṣayā rūpakasyātra samāse sphuṭatvena pratīte rūpakaṃ saṃśritam / anenaiva hy abhiprāyeṇa vakṣyati rūpakasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_22: viṣaye upamāyā yatheti / tābhyāṃ spardhitum iti / rūpakaṃ śleṣarūpakābhyām / tayor yathāpūrvam iti / upamāpekṣayā rūpakasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_0: nanv evaṃ satīti / asya doṣasyātiprasaṅgaṃ brūte / tāpa ātapo 'pi / phalaṃ śālyādikam api / sumanasaḥ puṣpāṇy api / khalatā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_1: durjanatvaṃ, dhānyādikṣodanasthānaṃ ca / asatī dūṣaṇīyā aśobhanā ca / yadalaṅkāreti / khalatām ityādāv upamotthāpite śleṣe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_2: nopamā śleṣaṃ bādhate / tasya viviktaviṣaytvābhāvāt / śleṣas tu tām bādhate iti yuktam / asya nyāyasyālaṅkārāntare 'pi bhāvād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_3: vyāptigarbham uktaṃ yad alaṅkāreti / nibandhanāntarābhāve iti / sati samāsoktyādinibandhane pūrvavat śleṣottāpitopamā na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_4: kartavyā syāt / na cātrānirākṛtetyādiviśeṣaṇasāmyāt samāsoktir iti vācyam / viśeṣaṇānāṃ niyatopamānagāmitvāpratīteḥ / atra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_5: viṣayatāśaṅkaiveti upamāviṣayatvasaṃbhāvanety arthaḥ / kva cit tu tada[tadv]iṣayateti pāṭhaḥ / tatra śleṣaviṣayatvam upamāviṣayatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_6: ca yugapan na śaṅkanīyaṃ tayor utsargāpavādedabhāve na vyavasthiter ity arthaḥ / uktadoṣadvayeti / uktaṃ yac śleṣaviṣaye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_7: doṣadvayaṃ - yatra samāsoktiviṣaye śleṣaḥ kṛtaḥ śleṣaviṣaye copameti, tasyātra saṃbandhābhāvād ity arthaḥ / yadalaṅkāreti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_8: śleṣopamādīnām alaṅkārāṇām abhivyaktyarthaṃ ye śabdā abjam ivetyādayaḥ tebhyo 'laṅkārebhya itaraḥ samāsoktiśleṣādiḥ tair
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_9: eva śabdaiḥ alpatarair abjam ivetyādirahitair yadi vyajyeta tadāsau samāsoktiśleṣādir laghutvād grāhyo, nāparaḥ śleṣopamādir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_10: ity arthaḥ / nanu śobhātiśayahetutvam alaṅkārāntarāṇāṃ lakṣaṇam / tad viśeṣyate / tat katham idam uktam ity āha - na hy astīti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_11: śobhātiśayajanane nije vyāpāre nāsty alaṅkārāṇāṃ viśeṣaḥ / tataś caiko gṛhyate 'paras tyajyata iti na yuktam / gurulaghutvam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_12: āśritya punar yujyata etan nānyatheti tātparyam / vācyātiśayāpekṣayā caitad uktam pratīyamānatvāpekṣayā tu samanantaraṃ viśeṣo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_13: vakṣyate / kiṃ cetyādinā kāvyakriyāyāṃ saundaryaniṣpatteḥ prayojakatvam alaṅkāraniṣpatteś ca anuniṣpāditaṃ yathā vaktā vedanācāmayoḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_14: ity āha / samāsoktiśleṣabhaṅgibhyām eveti / samāsoktyā tu alakālītyādau / śleṣeṇa bhairavācārya ityādau / nopameyeti / alakālītyādāv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_15: upamā śleṣopamā / bhairavācārya ityādau upamaivopamā / atra samāsoktiśleṣabhaṅgibhyām eva ity etadgranthānusāreṇa rūpakasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_16: viṣaye upamāyā yathetyādigranthaḥ prakṣipta iva lakṣyate / rūpakasyehānupasaṃhārād, uktadoṣadvayayogāsiddheḥ ity asya ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_17: pūrvoktagranthasyātra pakṣe nyūnatvād ataś caivāyaṃ kva cid ādarśe na paṭhyate / aprakṣepe tu trirūpakagrahaṇam iha kartvyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_18: syāt / tasmāt sa vā grantho nivārya iha vā rūpakagrahaṇaṃ prakṣepyam / uktadoṣadvayeti ca prakṛtaucityena vyākhyātam / te
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_19: hi tatsiddhīti / rasabandhasiddhāv alaṅkārā avaśyaṃ sidhyantīty arthaḥ / niṣpādakatvam ihānmāpakatvam / ata eva bharate rasaniṣpattir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_20: ity atra rasānumitir iti vyākhyeyam / tadvaicitryaṃ vibhāvādivaicitryam / tadāśrayāḥ paraṃparayā rasāśrayā rasajñaptihetava
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_21: ity arthaḥ / tenaiṣām iti / kaver arthagataṃ cārutvaṃ tātparyeṇa saṃpādyaṃ, nālaṅkāropanibandhaḥ alaṅkārāṇāṃ tannāntarīyakatvenāprādhānyāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_22: ataś cārutvaṃ yathā niṣpadyate tathā teṣām upanibandhaḥ kāryaḥ / tatprayojanāc cādhānoddharaṇādaya ity arthaḥ / nānvahādhānoddharaṇādaya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_23: ity uktyā alaṅkārāṇāṃ parasparaṃ cārutvaniṣpādane viśeṣaḥ pratipāditaḥ / pūrvaṃ ca na hy asti nije ityādinā viśeṣābhāva uktaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_24: tat kathaṃ na virodhaḥ / naitat / pūrvam avavadhānena cārutvaniṣpādanaṃ manasikṛtya viśeṣābhāvaḥ pratipāditaḥ / iha tu vibhāvādyupakaraṇatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_25: gurulaghutvādinā viśeṣa ukta ity apekṣābhedā[n na] virodhaḥ kaś cit /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_0: kaiś cid iti vāmanaprabhṛtibhiḥ / adhunā yat pratijñāmātreṇa pratipāditaṃ yathā śabdasya śaktyantarābhāvād vyañjakatvaṃ na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_1: saṃbhavati iti tadvācyāvacanodāharaṇatvopayogi śleṣaprasaṅgenopapādayitum āsūtrayati - sa cāyam iti / yas samāsoktiviṣaye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_2: kṛto yasya ca viṣaye upamā kṛtā sa ity arthaḥ / dvividha iti vakṣyamāṇasyobhayaśleṣasyātraivāntarbhāvaḥ / ābhyām eva samuccitābhyāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_3: tasyotthāpanāt / yatrānyūneti yatra viśeṣyasya viśeṣaṇaṃ na nyūnībhavati nāpy atiricyate, tatra śleṣaḥ / mātragrahaṇaṃ liṅgavacanānāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_4: bhedād ubhayasaṃbandhasahiṣṇuśabdatāparigrahārtham / kartṛkarmeti / kartṛkarmarūpaḥ ādigrahaṇāt kriyārūpo yatra pradhānabhūto
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_5: 'rthaḥ śleṣeṇa svarūpahāniṃ nīyate, na tatra śleṣo niravadya ity arthaḥ / tasya ca dharmapratipādakaśabdaviṣayatvena dharmipratipādakaśabdaviṣayatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_6: ca dvaividhyam / ubhayapratipādakaśabdaviṣayatvaṃ tu dūṣayiṣyate / aparas tv iti / arthaśleṣaḥ / ubhayatrāpi śabdaśleṣe 'rthaśleṣe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_7: ca / yāvad ivādi nibandhanaṃ nāśritaṃ tāvad arthāntaram apramāṇakam eveti śleṣābhivyaktyarthaṃ nibandhanam āśrayaṇīyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_8: atrāntare iti phullamallikābhir dhavalā ye 'ṭṭās tripuracatuṣpuramahāprakārā āpaṇā vā tair vikāso hāso yasya tadvac ca dhavalāṭṭahāso
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_9: yasya / kusumasamayayugaṃ māsadvayaṃ ramyatvena tatsadṛśa ca yugaṃ kṛtādim upasaṃharan ajṛmbhata vikasitavān vyaktānanaś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_10: cābhūd mahākālo dīrghasamayaḥ saṃhartṛdevatāviśeṣaś ca / samāsoktīti / mahākāla ity atra mahāsamaya ity aśliṣṭe viśeṣyapade
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_11: prayukte viśeṣaṇasāmyād eva devatāviśeṣapratīteḥ samāsoktir bhavantī mahākālaśabdasyāvṛttau pramāṇam / na cātra mahākālaśabde
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_12: prayukte prayāsaḥ kaś cit / yena alakālikuletivat samāsoktyā śleṣasya vaiyarthyaṃ śaṅkyeta / ācchāditeti / parvatapakṣe ācchāditaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_13: vaipulyād diśaś cāmbaram ākāśaṃ ca yena, uccakair ucyatāṃ gāṃ bhūmiṃ cākramya vartamānaṃ, mahārohapariṇāhāni śṛṅgāṇi śikharāṇi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_14: yasya, tadaucityāc ca śirasi sphurac candralekham, evaṃvidhaṃ nageśaṃ parvatarājaṃ dṛṣṭvā ko na vismito bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_15: harapakṣe tu ācchāditaṃ paridhānīkṛta diśa eva asya nava vastraṃ yena, tathā u[k]taṃ sthūlaviṣāṇa ca vṛṣabham adhiruhya sthitaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_16: mastake candrakalānvitaṃ ca nageśa kailāsādhipatiṃ sākṣātkṛtya anugṛhītammanyatvena ko na vismayata ity arthaḥ / śveto dhāvatītivad
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_17: iti śabdatantram / pradīpavad iti punar arthatantram / yathāyogam iti tulyapradhānatvena sādhāraṇyaṃ tantram / atulyapradhānatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_18: tu prasaṅgaḥ / tayoḥ pratipattir iti / kiṃ cit khalu vastuśaktyaiva kāryakāri yathā dīpādi / kiṃ cit tu parāmarśāpekṣaṃ yathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_19: dhūmādi liṅgam / yatra yasmin viṣaye parāmarśanairapekṣyeṇa vastuśaktyaivobhayakāritvaṃ tatra tantrādi nānyatra / śabdaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_20: parāmarśāpekṣo 'rthapratītikārī / parāmarśo na nirnibandhana iti nātra tantrādipravṛttiḥ / ahāryaḥ parvataḥ / sahakāritā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_21: saha karaṇaśīlatva sahakārasaṃbandhaś ca / anavamā utkṛṣṭāḥ / navaḥ pratyagraḥ / mādhavo vasantaḥ / ramyatātireketi sahakārasaṃbandharūpa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_22: ity arthaḥ / tasya vācyasyeti / tacchabdena nibandhanaṃ parāmṛṣṭam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_0: samayasmṛtiḥ saṅketasmaraṇam / asiddham ekatvam iti / tataś ca nāyaṃ tantrāder viṣayaḥ / tattvam ekatvam / avyayānavyayātmakam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_1: iti / avyayam ivādi / anavyayaṃ sadṛśādi / dharmārthasyeti / śleṣād abhinnatvam iti yojyam / prakaṭeti / kulayaś caṭakāḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_2: tad uktam - kuliḥ kuliṅgaś caṭakaḥ iti / te ca te śakuntāḥ śakunayaḥ teṣāṃ cakreṇa samūhena bhāsvatīnāṃ valabhīnāṃ hitāḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_3: anurūpā mattavāraṇāḥ aṅkaḥ cihnaṃ yasyāḥ / niśānto 'ntaḥpuram / viḍambayantī uapahasantī / samarabhūpakṣe kuliśaṃ vajraṃ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_4: kuntāḥ prāsāḥ / cakrāṇi arīṇi / tair bhāsvadbhiḥ / vyatireko viḍambayantīti prakāśitaḥ / prakaṭetyādau ca viśeṣaṇabhāge 'tra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_5: śleṣaḥ / uṣasīti / andhakāra eva malinatvāt paṅkaḥ / tasya vigalitasya plavo 'navasthānaṃ tena śabalaṃ vicitram / ghanavartma
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_6: viyat / dūram atyartham / madhuraḥ sukumāro yas taraṇitāpo raviprabhā tadyogena tāraṃ hṛdyam / madhupāyino bhramarās teṣāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_7: paṅktiḥ / andhakārapaṅkaplava eva vigalanena nissāratvāc chavaḥ tasya laṅghanena vartmasu pakṣmasu dūramā aramaṇīyaśrīḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_8: madhuratā makarandāsaktā tathā raṇitā saśabdā, yad vā madhuratena makarandāsaṅgena raṇitaṃ guñjitaṃ yasyāḥ / payogatā jalagatā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_9: aram atyartham / atra ghanavartmaśabdasyopameyavācinaḥ śleṣe 'ntarbhāvāt dharmidharmobhayārthasyodāharaṇatve nyāyye dharmārthasyodāharaṇatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_10: cintyam / anavarateti / anavarataṃ nayanasalilena sicyamāno vṛddhiṃ nīyamānaḥ / tathā anavarataṃ nayanaṃ prāpaṇaṃ yasya tena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_11: salilena sicyamāna ārdratvaṃ prāpyamāṇaḥ / vipado lavaḥ sūkṣmabhāgo vipallavo vigatakisalayaś ca / prarohati vistīrṇībhavati
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_12: aṅkurāṃś ca muñcati dharmāṃś ca muñcati dharmārthatvam iti / kila atra sthitam api dharmārthatvaṃ nopamānaviśeṣaṇatvāyālaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_13: viśeṣaṇatvasya kakṣyāntarabhāvitvāt / na cāvṛttim antareṇa kakṣyāntaraparigraho nyāyyaḥ / na cātrāvṛttiḥ kāryā / pramāṇābhāvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_14: anāvṛttau tu tasyām eva kakṣyāyāṃ viśeṣaṇatve upameyasvarūpāpahāraprasaṅga iti padārthaḥ / tasyopameyeti tacchabdena vipallavaśabdaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_15: parāmṛṣṭaḥ / yaḥ punar iti śleṣaprayojakaḥ śabdaḥ / apradhānaṃ viśeṣaṇabhūtam / pradhānasya hi pūrvoktanyāyenāvṛttir nyāyyā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_16: nibandhanam ivādi / sānuparvatasya mālabhūbhāgaḥ / aṅkollākhyās taravaḥ teṣāṃ pallavā bhāsvanto yatra / aṅkollaśabdaḥ prākṛtabhāṣāpadam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_17: api kavibhir atiprasiddhyā śleṣādiṣu prayujyate / tathā ca sakuśāṅkollapallavā / maithilīva śriyaṃ dhatte iti parimalena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_18: prayutam / saṃskṛte punar aṅkoṭhaśabdaḥ sthitaḥ / tathā bhāsvān aṅke ullapan mukharaḥ lavākhyaḥ putro yatreti sāmānyenānyapadārtho
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_19: gṛhyate / iheti vipallavaśabde / ivādyavyayam iti / tarur iveti prayuktasyevaśabdasyānyathā vyavasthāpayiṣyamāṇatvāt / alaṅkārāntaraṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_20: samāsoktyādi / pradhānārthasaṃsparśamātrād iti / yataḥ tena padena saṃbhavadapradhānārthenāpi pradhānabhūto 'rthaḥ saṃspṛṣṭaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_21: tato 'ntarasaṃbandhāsahiṣṇutvāt dvirupādānārhatvam / yatra ca pradhānāpradhānobhayārthasya dvirupādānam avaśyaṃ kāryam, tatra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_22: daṇḍāpūpikayā tadekārthasya pradhānamātrārthasya śabdasya dvirupādānaṃ nyāyasiddham eva / rucir dīptiḥ abhilāṣaś ca ruciḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_23: atra dvau ruciśabdau viśeṣyavācitvāt pradhānārthau / nanūpamānasya yadi viśeṣyatvaṃ nopameyaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ tat katham upameyasaṃbandhiny
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_24: upamānasya vibhaktiḥ yathā vāgarthāv iva saṃpṛktau iti / naiṣa doṣaḥ / viśeṣaṇatvam avacchedakatvaṃ tac copamānasyopameyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_25: praty upamitikriyāyāṃ vidyata eva / anyathā tayoḥ saṃbandhābhāvād ananvyaprasaṅgaḥ / sthite viśeṣaṇatve tasya na viśeṣyavibhakter
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_26: hāniḥ kā cit / yat punar ihopamānaśabdasya viśeṣyavācitvam uktaṃ tad dharmitābhiprāyeṇa / dharmī hy upamānam / na ca svatantratvāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_27: viśeṣyārthaḥ / ataś caivāyaṃ strīva gacchati ṣaṇḍo 'yam ity upameyaliṅgaṃ na bhajate / dharmavāci tu viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaliṅgam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_28: eva / tad uktam - guṇavacanānām āśrayato liṅgavacanāni bhavanti iti / tad evam upamānam upameyavibhaktiṃ na na bhajate dharmitvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_29: ca na jahātīti / khalatā durjanatvam / khalatā ākāśavallī / atra prayukta iti / tarur ivety atra / vākyabhedaprasaṅgād iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_30: saṃbhavaty ekavākyatve vākyabhedaś ca neṣyate iti vākyabhedasya pratipattigauravavattvād dheyatvam / atha samāsoktīti / anavaratajaletyāder
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_31: viśeṣaṇasya dvyarthatvāt / upamānabhūteti / yatropamānabhūtasya dharmiṇo 'nyasyārthasya gamyamānatvaṃ tatra samāsoktiḥ, na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_32: sākṣād upādāna ity arthaḥ / kva cid iti / babhravaḥ kapilāḥ / etad dāvāgniviśeṣaṇaṃ san nakulalakṣaṇam arthaṃ pratipādayatīti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_33: dharmidharmobhayātmatvam / evaṃ hariṇā haritā mṛgāś ca / jaṭā mūlāni keśasaṃniveśāś ca / valkalaṃ vṛkṣatvak tatkṛtaṃ ca vāsaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_34: kapilāḥ piṅgalā muniviśeṣāś ca / āropaviṣayabahutvād āropyamānānām api bahutvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:189_0: kesariṇaṃ bakulapuṣpavantaṃ siṃhaṃ ca / vasantaṃ mādhavaṃ nivasantaṃ ca / abhimāno dhārādhirūḍho māno mahāpramāṇaś ca / durvāraṇo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:189_1: 'śakyavāraṇo duṣṭaś ca karī / matto matsakāśāt samadaś ca / abhimāna iti na tathā hṛdayaṅgamaḥ pāṭhaḥ / anyonyam iti vasantam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:189_2: ity asya kesariṇam iti viśeṣaṇaṃ, siṃhapakṣe ca kesariṇam ity asya vasantam iti / rūpyeti yaḥ kesarī pratītaḥ sa vasantasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:189_3: rūpakatvena na tāṭasthyena / evaṃ vasantam ity asya nivasanārthayoge 'pi vasantārthaḥ kesariṇo rūpakatvena yojanīyaḥ / ittham
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:189_4: eva durvāraṇābhimānayor vācyam / viśeṣyatvena rūpyatvena ca svatantratvaṃ, tadviparyayeṇa paratantratvam / viśeṣyādyātmaketi /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:189_5: ādigrahaṇena rūpyarūpakabhāvo gṛhyate / tilakas taruviśeṣas tilakaś ca viśeṣakaḥ / tadabhivyaktir ubhayārthābhivyaktiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:189_6: tayor ubhayor arthayoḥ / guṇavanto rajjuyuktā api ghaṭakāḥ saṅghaṭayitāro hrasvāś ca ghaṭāḥ / pārthivā rājānaḥ, na tu vakṣyamāṇayuktyā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:189_7: pṛthivīvikārā vyākhyeyāḥ guṇavattvaghaṭakatvayor iti / yady apy atra samīhitasiddhau hetutvena vyavasthitasya ghaṭakā ity
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:189_8: asya pārthivā iti prati viśeṣaṇatvaṃ, tathāpi kūpa ivety upamāsāmarthyād viśeṣyatvam api ghaṭate //
